postTitle: 远程兼职 UI 设计师（做过产品经理）
jobTitle: 远程兼职 UI 设计师
descContent:
一、岗位简介

我们正在寻找长期合作的 远程兼职 UI 设计师，主要负责移动端 / Web 端产品的界面设计。  
以项目 / 任务为单位结算，适合有稳定本职工作、但希望利用空闲时间接单的设计师。

二、工作内容

1.根据产品需求文档或原型，完成页面的 UI 视觉设计（含颜色、字体、组件样式等）。  
2.输出设计稿与切图（Figma / Sketch / XD 等皆可），并保证层级和命名清晰，方便前端实现。  
3.参与简单的交互动效设计或补充界面说明文档（如有需要）。  
4.沟通工具中保持基本在线回复，确认需求与验收结果。

三、任职要求  
1.3 年及以上 UI 设计经验，做过产品经理，有完整的 App 或 Web 项目作品。  
2.熟练使用 Figma / Sketch / Photoshop 等主流设计工具。  
3.熟悉 iOS / Android 基本设计规范，理解响应式 / 自适应布局。  
4.审美在线，风格偏简洁、干净，能够根据产品定位调整设计方向。  
5.具备良好的沟通能力和自我驱动能力，能按时交付设计成果。

四、加分项（非必需）  
1.工具类、SaaS 等产品设计经验。  
2.了解基础前端（如组件拆分、栅格系统），与开发沟通无障碍。  
3.具备 icon 设计或插画能力。  
4.能长期稳定接单，每周有固定可支配时间。

五、工作方式与时间  
工作方式：完全远程，线上沟通与交付。  
时间安排：按任务安排，可在自己空闲时间完成，但需遵守双方约定的交付时间。

六、结算方式  
结算模式：按次 / 按项目结算，在每个任务开始前明确：  
工作范围（页面数量、复杂度）  
交付物（设计稿格式、切图、文档等）

七、投递方式  
可电我查看联系方式与邮箱，或留言简单介绍后联系  
个人简历（注明目前状态和可接单时间）；  
代表性作品集或作品链接（需包含至少 1–2 个完整项目）；  
期望 单次/单页 价格区间或常用计价方式

postTitle: 【远程全职】AI角色扮演 - 全栈工程师
descContent:
关于我们：
我们是一家海外注册的合法公司。专注于互动叙事与角色驱动的创作平台建设。产品形态涵盖角色卡系统、即时剧情与对话引擎、图文创作与发现、收藏与社群运营等。

我们在寻找：
一位能独当一面的全栈工程师，你将在一个快速成长的创业团队中，端到端地负责产品功能开发

日常工作：
*   前端开发（50%）：使用 Next.js/React 构建高性能、美观的用户界面
*   后端开发（30%）：根据需求直接操作数据库，开发 API 接口，处理业务逻辑
*   测试与再设计（20%）：在上线前夕，上线以后持续测试和监控功能的正常工作，并且在测试中感知功能是否应该调整。
*   与团队紧密合作，快速迭代产品功能
*   优化应用性能，确保在高并发场景下的稳定运行
*   参与技术决策，推动最佳实践的落地

技术要求： 必须具备：
*   3年以上 Web 开发经验，至少1年全栈开发经验
*   精通 JavaScript/TypeScript/CSS，熟练使用 React/Next.js
*   能够独立完成 API 开发和数据库设计（PostgreSQL/MySQL）

加分项：
*   Supabase/Firebase 等 BaaS 平台使用经验
*   Nest.js 或其他 Node.js 后端框架经验
*   UI/UX 设计能力或审美敏感度
*   开源项目贡献经历
    
 薪资：3,000 - 6,500 USDT/月（加密货币支付）
第一个月3000刀起，之后1-3个月内按照贡献和实力对齐工资。

特别注意：
* 我们通过USDT(TRC20）发工资，如果你位于中国大陆，需要自行考虑如何出金安全可靠（不会遇到质问，冻卡等问题），常见做法是在香港开户出金。
* 法律方面，由于我们的AI并不限制成人和政治内容，你需要自行考虑在你国家/地区的风险。这项业务在公司主体所在的国家是合法纳税的，此外，我们不做任何违反普世价值观的事情。
*公司拥有健康的现金流。 在你可以胜任的情况下，几年内几乎不可能存在被裁员这种事情。

感兴趣的朋友可以通过邮箱或者申请链接：https://airtable.com/appMne1xNexrR4GF9/pagRDGvsYIKRFkcXQ/form
jobCategory: 全栈开发,前端开发,后端开发,AI,DevOps/MLOps

postTitle: 招高级 java
descContent:
岗位职责：
- 负责企业级业务系统的后端设计与开发，基于主流开源技术栈构建高可用、可扩展的中后台系统；
- 参与系统架构设计，制定技术方案，优化系统性能、安全性和可维护性；
- 设计并实现统一权限控制体系（包括菜单、按钮、数据权限等），支持复杂组织架构下的权限管理；
- 开发通用功能模块（如日志审计、操作记录、定时任务、文件存储、消息通知等），提升系统复用性和开发效率；
- 配合 DevOps 流程，完成应用部署、监控与日常运维，保障生产环境稳定运行；
- 编写高质量、结构清晰、可测试的 Java 代码，遵循良好的编码规范和工程实践；
- 协助团队进行技术选型、代码评审与知识沉淀，推动工程标准化建设。
任职要求：
- 本科及以上学历，计算机或相关专业，5 年以上 Java 后端开发经验；
- 精通 Spring Boot + MyBatis-Plus 技术栈，有基于该体系构建中后台系统的完整项目经验；
- 熟悉 前后端分离架构，掌握 RESTful API 设计规范，了解 Vue/React 等主流前端框架的基本协作方式；
- 具备 完整的权限系统开发经验，包括基于 Token 的认证（如 Sa-Token / JWT / Spring Security）、RBAC 模型、动态菜单、细粒度数据权限控制等；
- 熟练使用 Redis、RabbitMQ/Kafka、Elasticsearch 等中间件，能根据业务场景合理选型与集成；
- 具备 基础服务器运维能力：熟悉 Linux 环境，能独立部署 Java 应用，配置 Nginx、管理服务进程、分析日志、监控系统资源；
- 有 中小型业务系统架构经验，能独立完成模块划分、数据库设计、接口定义、缓存策略、异常处理等技术方案；
- 熟悉 SQL 编写与优化，掌握索引设计、执行计划分析，了解读写分离、分页优化等常见数据库性能实践；
- 责任心强，具备良好的沟通能力、问题解决能力和团队协作意识。
加分项：
- 有基于开源中后台框架进行二次开发或定制化扩展的经验；
- 熟悉代码生成器、动态数据源、多租户、工作流（如 Flowable/Activiti）等企业级功能实现；
- 了解 Docker 容器化部署、Shell 脚本编写或 CI/CD 流程；
- 有数据报表、客户账单、销售管理等业务系统开发背景。

工作方式：
前期可以远程工作，确定合适后可以转办公室工作，工作地点在广东江门

jobTitle: SRE 运维工程师（DEX 方向）
descContent:
Position 一: SRE 运维工程师（ DEX 方向）  
Job Type: Full-Time ，Remote/最好可以 base 深圳，  
Industry: Web3  
PS：  
1 、全日制计算机专业本科及以上，需要有 CEX/DEX 全职背景，  
2 、SRE ，偏业务运维，  
3 、技术上，要求对 AWS ，K8S 非常熟悉，在高并发的业务场景工作过比较契合。  
  
Position 二：测试技术向(测试开发 DEX ）  
Job Type: Full-Time ，Remote  
Salary：$ 4000 - 6000/month+季度奖⾦  
PS：  
1.技术背景：全日制计算机相关专业本科及以上, 熟悉 Java/Rust/Python/Flutter/JavaScript/TypeScript
中至少一门语言；  
2.测试经历：从事过大型/复杂的异步微服务系统的测试；  
3.自动化经验：精通 Puppeteer/Selenium/Playwright/Cypress 等 UI 自动化工具，或
Pytest/Mocha/Chai 等接口测试框架。  
4.性能/安全：了解常见的智能合约漏洞（重入攻击、整数溢出等）或有 Locust/JMeter 性能测试经验。  
5.Web3 技术栈：熟练使用 Hardhat, Foundry, Truffle 等开发框架，熟悉 Ethers.js / Web3.js 库的使用。  
6.合约能力：具备 Solidity 阅读与基础编写能力，理解 EVM 原理，能独立编写合约测试用例。  
[加分项]  
1.有大型 DEX 或公链项目自动化测试架构理解/搭建经验。  
2.熟悉 Java / Rust 语言。  
3.在 Github 上有 Web3 相关的开源项目或贡献。  
重心：  
必须要做过 1 年以上智能合约测试，最近 1 年+做 dex 智能合约测试。  
  
Position 三：测试工程师（业务向-侧重业务逻辑与金融准确性）  
Job Type: Full-Time ，Remote  
Salary：$ 4000 - 6000/month+季度奖⾦  
PS：  
Focus：业务闭环、金融逻辑、用户体验、多链环境  
1.必须有智能合约测试经验，至少 2 年以上金融类产品或 DeFi 赛道测试经验，有 DEX （去中心化交易所）相关测试经历者优先。  
有永续合约、现货交易系统测试经验，或金融 / 证券 / 期货行业测试背景者优先。  
2.业务理解：深刻理解永续合约交易、现货交易逻辑；  
3.工具使用：熟练使用接口测试工具，精通区块链浏览器查阅交易细节，尽量将问题根因表述出来；  
4.逻辑思维：对数字敏感，具备较强的逻辑思维能力，能够手动或通过 Excel 计算复杂的 DeFi 收益模型进行验证；  
5.素质要求：具备极强的责任心与严谨性， “零误差”
有极致追求，能主动规避潜在业务风险，逻辑思维缜密，数字敏感度高，具备独立拆解复杂业务流程、梳理测试要点的能力。  
[加分项]  
1.有金融/证券/期货交易系统测试经验者优先；  
2.有 DEX 经验优先；  
3.有代码基础，经历/理解过较为复杂的微服务系统优先；  
4.有私钥管理安全意识，了解多签钱包流程；  
重心：  
必须要做过 1 年以上智能合约测试，最近 1 年+做 dex 智能合约测试。  
  
Position 四：前端研发工程师（ RWA 方向，需要有相关经验）  
Job Type: Full-Time ，Onsite-上海  
Salary：$ 4000 - 4500/month+季度奖⾦  
PS：  
1\. 3 年及以上前端开发经验，熟练 HTML5 、CSS3 、JS 等前端相关技术；  
2\. 良好的沟通能力，执行力强，具有优秀的合作精神和敬业精神；  
3\. 熟练使用 Vue 、React 中的至少一种框架；  
4\. 熟练使用 Vuex 、Redux 、MobX 、effector 等至少一种状态管理框架；  
5\. 熟悉 Vite 、Webpack 、Rollup 等前端构建工具的使用；  
6\. 对于 Web 页面的性能优化、安全防控有一定理解或实践；  
7\. 有大型前端工程项目开发、架构经验者优先；  
8\. 有 Web3 （ RWA ）开发经验；  
9\. 熟悉一种后端语言，如 Python 、Go 、Rust 等优先。  
  
Position 五：Flutter 工程师  
Job Type: Full-Time ，前期深圳现场 3/4 个月，后期完全远程办公。  
Salary：$ 5000 - 7000/month + 奖⾦  
PS  
1\. 全日制计算机相关专业本科及以上学历。  
2\. 2 年以上（工程师）或 5 年以上（资深工程师）前端开发经验。  
3\. 精通 Flutter 等主要的技术栈。  
4\. 熟悉主流前端框架（ React 、Vue 或 Angular ）。  
5\. 熟悉版本控制工具（ Git ）、构建工具（ Webpack 、Vite 等）。  
6\. 了解 RESTful API 、WebSocket 等数据接口调用方式。  
7\. 具备良好的编码规范和文档编写能力。  
8\. 优秀的沟通能力和团队合作精神。  
加分项：  
1 具备加密货币、区块链相关行业经验。  
2 了解 Web3.js 、ethers.js 等区块链交互技术。  
3 有高并发、高性能前端项目经验。  
4 了解移动端（ H5/APP ）开发。  
5 有 UI/UX 设计基础体验。  
  
Position 六：产品经理（交易平台）  
Job Type: Full-Time ，Remote  
Salary：$ 4000-5000/month +奖金  
PS：  
1 、211/双一流本科及以上学历，3 年以上产品管理经验，有千万级用户端产品管理经验者优先。  
2 、加密行业经验:具有加密行业或管理交易（现货/合约/衍生品）产品经验者优先。  
3 、产品规划:制定并执行 APP/WEB 端的产品计划，展示出强大的规划和有效制定战略的能力。  
4 、端到端产品管理:监督用户端产品功能的完整流程，包括需求分析、方案设计和项目实施的资源协调。  
  
Position 七：Senior Product Manager （ Perps DEX ）  
Job Type: Full-Time ，Remote  
Salary：$ 10000+ / month+ 奖⾦/Token 激励措施  
PS：  
职责范围  
● 设计并推动新版本协议架构，涵盖订单簿机制、执行引擎及跨保证金系统，重点实现超低延迟与高频交易能力。  
● 设计并实施专业交易功能，包括高级订单类型、风险管理框架及机构级投资组合管理工具。  
● 主导技术规范制定，协调工程团队推进协议开发，聚焦系统性能、安全性和可扩展性。  
● 设计做市商激励机制、流动性提供策略及费用结构，确保协议可持续性与收益最大化。  
● 统筹用户研究、竞品分析及利益相关方管理，覆盖开发团队、做市商、交易员及社区治理。  
任职要求  
●一定要具备 4 年以上 DEX/DeFi 产品经验。  
● 精通中心化交易所/去中心化交易所架构。  
● 具备低延迟交易系统开发经验。  
● 拥有复杂金融产品落地交付实绩。  
● 工作语言：英语及普通话商务流利。  
  
Position 八 ：Compliance & Licensing Manager  
Job Type: Full-Time ，Remote （ Hong Kong, Singapore, Dubai, Europe ）  
Salary:$ 7000-12000/m  
PS：  
●Bachelor’s degree or higher in Law, Finance, or Economics; LL.M. or JD is a
plus.  
●3/8+ years of experience in legal, compliance, or regulatory affairs within
crypto sectors.  
●Proven experience managing full license lifecycles — including application,
maintenance, and renewal — across multiple entities.  
●Strong understanding of VASP, MSB, EMI, and MiCA regimes, particularly in
UAE, EU, El Salvador, Seychelles, or other offshore jurisdictions.  
●Deep knowledge of AML/KYC/CFT/Sanctions requirements and their operational
execution.  
●Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills; able to operate
effectively in global teams.  
●Fluent in English and Mandarin (required)，Spanish proficiency is an
advantage.  
  
请携带简历咨询，谢谢；  
TG：@jtx_2023  
E: [justinxu@futuretalent.com.cn](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection)

postTitle: Coding Bootcamp﹣Job Guaranteed
descContent:

postTitle: [可远程办公] 资深 Golang 后端
jobTitle: [可远程办公] 资深 Golang 后端
descContent:
Golang 核心职责  
\- 微服务架构开发：参与设计与实现基于 Golang 的现代化微服务架构，支持高并发与大规模用户场景  
\- API 服务开发：构建高性能、可扩展的 RESTful API 和 gRPC 服务，驱动核心业务  
\- 数据库设计：主导 PostgreSQL 架构设计与性能优化，保障数据安全与高效  
\- 云原生开发：打造基于 Kubernetes 的容器化应用，服务全球多区域用户  
\- 性能优化：持续调优服务性能，应对千万级请求与高并发挑战  
\- 服务监控：集成分布式追踪、指标监控与日志系统，确保平台稳定可靠  
[加分项] DevOps 核心职责  
\- 生产环境维护：运维跨区域 K3s 集群，保障核心服务高可用  
\- 网络基础设施管理：掌控 Nebula VPN 网格网络与 FRR BGP 路由系统，构建全球互联  
\- GitOps 流水线管理：维护 Flux CD 自动化发布流水线，实现快速、安全的持续交付  
\- 服务网格运维：管理 Istio Ambient 模式服务网格，确保流量治理与安全策略落地  
\- 可观测性体系：搭建与维护 OTEL 全链路监控体系，实时掌握系统健康状态  
日常工作  
\- 需求分析：与产品和设计深度协作，快速理解业务需求并转化为技术方案  
\- 代码开发：编写高质量、易维护的 Golang 代码，持续追求最佳实践  
\- 单元与集成测试：保障核心服务的稳定性与可靠性  
\- 代码审查：积极参与 Code Review，提升团队整体代码质量  
\- 技术文档：编写清晰的 API、架构与运维文档，推动知识沉淀  
\- 故障响应：第一时间定位并解决生产环境问题，保障 SLA  
技术创新  
\- 架构设计：参与前瞻性的系统架构设计与技术选型，驱动业务长期可扩展性  
\- 工具开发：打造内部工具与自动化脚本，提升团队效率  
\- 技术研究：紧跟 Golang 与云原生生态最新趋势，将前沿技术应用到实际场景  
\- 知识分享：通过内部分享与培训，影响并提升整个团队的技术能力  
为什么加入我们？  
\- 面对真实的高并发、跨区域、多集群生产环境，快速积累一线实战经验  
\- 灵活的工作方式：远程办公 + 弹性时间  
\- 有竞争力的薪资与丰厚年终奖（高绩效者 4 个月以上）  
\- 系统化培训与学习支持，持续进阶为行业专家  
我们的工作方式  
\- 远程优先与弹性时间，以目标与产出为导向。  
\- 小步快跑：短周期迭代、灰度发布、数据驱动决策。  
\- 高标准代码质量：Spec-First、Design Docs、代码评审、自动化测试与度量。  
\- 透明沟通：问题直说、复盘改进、持续学习。

postTitle: 一分钟视频任务 20元当天结算 简单安全！
jobTitle: 模拟医疗问诊视频人员
descContent:
您好，我们是一家医疗支持公司，募集模拟医疗问诊视频人员，以下为该任务流程和注意事项

1 在任务当天会给您拉微信群，告知您所要报的名字。到时请提前开启摄像头并确保正对面部，按照工作人员指示报名。微信视频用时两分钟左右即可。

 根据当天情况，时间可能会有所变动，请及时回复消息。任务当天所有交流都请在群内进行！

2 请确保在网络良好，无噪音的环境下进行视频，尽可能远离车辆和人群。
 视频不允许佩戴墨镜和口罩或者其它遮挡面部的物品，请在视频前脱下。
 视频全程不涉及您的其它个人信息，仅用作流程训练。
 视频形式为微信的会议小程序。如出现账号被封等技术问题，也可以使用腾讯会议APP。如有需求可以参考以下网页https://meeting.tencent.com/support/topic/1661/index.html

3 在当天18点前通过扫描微信收款码发放20元酬金，出现遗漏的情况请在此时间之前告知。
 如果有介绍人请您务必在完成后发送其微信名片。

4 **严禁一人同时使用两个微信号来做两次任务！一旦发现，不进行任何报酬结算！**

如果对以上内容没有异议，请您添加微信号或者留言。

postTitle: 日本滑雪项目运营（可兼职/可远程办公）
jobTitle: 日本滑雪项目运营（可兼职/可远程办公）
descContent:
【岗位描述】  
我们是一家专注于滑雪旅游与内容运营的公司，现诚邀一位具备丰富滑雪经验的全方位运营加入团队，共同打造面向中国及全球市场的滑雪品牌与业务体系。  
该岗位将负责日本滑雪相关业务的整体策划与落地执行，包括内容、活动、资源及品牌运营，要求候选人对滑雪文化有深刻理解，并熟悉日本当地滑雪生态。  
【岗位职责】  
1.负责日本滑雪项目的整体运营与执行，包括内容策划、品牌推广、行程设计及商务合作；  
2.策划并执行滑雪主题活动、达人体验、团建及定制滑雪行程；  
3.配合BD对接日本当地雪场、住宿、交通、装备租赁、教联及其他合作资源；  
4.管理滑雪主页后台，定时更新上传雪场、酒店、出行信息；  
5.持续研究滑雪市场趋势与用户需求，优化产品与服务体验。  
【加分项】  
1.在日本拥有丰富的滑雪经验，熟悉主流雪场（如二世古、白马、妙高、藏王等）；  
2.本身为滑雪爱好者，具备对滑雪运动的热情与专业认知；  
3.有过日本滑雪行程的组织、策划或执行经验（个人或团队项目均可）  
4.熟悉日本当地生活、交通及旅游配套资源；  
5.有社交媒体内容创作经验或达人资源；  
6.具备日语沟通能力.  
【工作地点】  
杭州，优秀者可远程办公，现长居日本更佳  
【薪酬福利】  
1.具备竞争力的薪酬与项目绩效激励；  
2.灵活办公制度与出行机会；  
3.与日本滑雪资源深度合作的平台；  
4.成长空间与品牌共建机会。
company: 杭州雪御科技有限公司
jobCategory: 运营,市场营销,项目管理,内容创作

postTitle: Engineering Director, Browser Platform  at DuckDuckGo
jobTitle: Engineering Director, Browser Platform  at DuckDuckGo
descContent:
**Who We Are**

Hi, we're DuckDuckGo, the online protection company and remote-first team of
300+ on a mission to raise the standard of trust online. Founded in 2008 and
profitable since 2014, annual revenue now exceeds $100m USD and millions use
our browser on [Mac](https://spreadprivacy.com/introducing-duckduckgo-for-
mac/), [Windows](https://spreadprivacy.com/windows-browser-open-beta/),
[iOS](https://spreadprivacy.com/duckduckgo-privacy-browser-ios14/), and
[Android](https://spreadprivacy.com/introducing-app-tracking-protection/), our
[search engine](https://duckduckgo.com/), and the [DuckDuckGo
subscription](https://duckduckgo.com/pro). Our
[culture](https://duckduckgo.com/how-we-work) of trust, inclusivity, and
empowered project management underpins everything we do, where each team
member takes full ownership of their projects, from scoping and execution to
postmortem. If you're seeking end-to-end ownership of your work — you've come
to the right place!

**Your Team and Role**

In this role you will lead the team that builds and evolves the core web
platform powering our private browsers on Windows, macOS, iOS, and Android.
Your team’s work ensures the browsers are fast, stable, and private by design.
You will define the architecture that enables product teams to deliver
innovative features with confidence, while reducing fragmentation and breakage
across platforms. This is a leadership role at the intersection of browser
engines, platform integration, and privacy innovation, directly influencing
how millions of people experience a safer web.

**About You**

  * Ability to lead and collaborate on high-impact and complex projects from proposal through post-mortem.

  * Skills to wrangle vague problems, propose innovative solutions, and execute them with a strong focus on metrics and impact.

  * 10+ years experience leading teams of technically strong developers working on large, complex consumer-facing products, desktop in particular.

  * Proven leadership experience across multiple consumer-facing products — you've made critical decisions that have broad, positive, and cascading impacts.

  * 4+ years experience in senior leadership roles (Director, VP) including people management, coaching, and mentoring experience.

  * Proven experience of leading technical teams through periods of rapid growth and scaling

  * Direct experience with browsers - Chromium, WebKit, or WebView development

  * Recent experience defining and driving technical work end-to-end on large-scale (modern C++14 or more recent) C++ codebases

  * Experience with other modern languages (C#, Swift, Kotlin, Rust)

  * Experience developing software for Mobile platforms or Desktop (Android/iOS/Windows)

**Compensation**

**$**_**243,800**_ **USD annually** and stock options. Compensation is
[identical within professional levels](https://duckduckgo.com/how-we-work),
regardless of geographic location or team. Compensation for each professional
level is transparent across the organization.

Our[ Team Member Support
Guide](https://duckduckgo.com/assets/hiring/team_support_guide.pdf) explains
how we prioritize your wellbeing including **paid parental leave, office
setup,** and **co-working allowances.**

**Hiring Process**

Hiring works best when it's a two-way street. Learn how we help you get to
know DuckDuckGo, envision your future role here, and find out more about [how
we hire](https://duckduckgo.com/how-we-hire).

**Diversity, Equity and Inclusion**

DuckDuckGo provides equal work opportunities to all team members and
applicants, and it prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type on the
basis of race, color, ethnicity, caste, religion, age, sex (including
pregnancy), national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran
status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other
characteristic protected by our policies or federal, state, or local laws.

We want to ensure that our hiring process is accessible. If you need
reasonable accommodation for any part of the application process because of a
medical condition or disability, please send an email to
[careers@duckduckgo.com](mailto:careers@duckduckgo.com) to let us know the
nature of your request.

**Please note that:**

    1. You’ll be required to attend meetings on camera via video conferencing

    2. Expect to travel at least two times a year: once for our all-hands meetup and again for a team retreat (each around 4-5 days). While extenuating circumstances may impact attendance, everyone is strongly encouraged to attend.

    3. While we offer a flexible work arrangement with no core hours, expect an average full-time commitment of 40 hours per week.

    4. A successful candidate must pass a background check as a condition of joining the team.

    5. By applying for this role, you confirm that all information submitted is accurate and complete. You further acknowledge that providing false or fraudulent information during the application process is cause for denial of an offer, revocation of any existing offer, or other adverse action, up to and including termination after the start of your commencement of work.

**Disclosure Statement: Use of AI in Hiring Process**

As part of our commitment to enhancing our recruitment process, we utilize
artificial intelligence (AI) technology to assist in reviewing and summarizing
job applications and test projects, including those tools integrated into our
recruitment vendor platforms. We use AI to flag potentially fraudulent
applications, analyze and summarize applicants’ experience, interviews, and
project performance, and help streamline our selection process.

**Key Principles:**

      1. **Data Privacy:** All information provided in your application will be handled in accordance with our [Recruiting Privacy Policy](https://duckduckgo.com/static-assets/files/pages/careers/DuckDuckGo-Recruiting-Privacy-Policy-effective-February-5-2025.pdf). We ensure that your personal information is protected and used solely for recruitment purposes.

      2. **Human Oversight and Accountability:** The AI technology is designed to support our hiring team by providing insights and summaries of applications and evaluations of test projects against scoring rubrics. All final evaluations and hiring decisions, however, will be made by our hiring team, who will consider the AI's input alongside other factors.

      3. **Transparency:** We believe in transparency regarding our hiring practices. If you have any questions about how AI is used in our recruitment process, please feel free to reach out to us.

By submitting your application, you acknowledge and consent to the use of AI
technology in our review process. If you would like to request an alternative
selection process, please contact us as at
[careers@duckduckgo.com](mailto:careers@duckduckgo.com). Thank you for your
interest in joining DuckDuckGo!
jobCategory: 客户端开发,前端开发,项目管理,安全,全栈开发

postTitle: 智能行为克隆与执行系统
jobTitle: 智能行为克隆与执行系统
descContent:
软件基本设计书：智能行为克隆与执行系统
 1. 系统概述
本软件旨在通过“演示\-标注\-克隆”的流程，让计算机自动学习人类在特定软件中的操作逻辑。它不依赖底层代码注入，而是像人类一样通过“看屏幕”和“动鼠标”来完成任务，属于 AI Agent 的典型应用场景 \[1\]。
 2. 模块详细设计
 模块一：程序资源管理器 (Program Explorer)
 功能描述：满足需求“浏览操作系统所有程序”。
 设计逻辑：
 文件遍历引擎：启动时扫描操作系统特定目录（如 \`Program Files\`, \`/Applications\`）或用户指定路径。
 过滤器：仅筛选可执行文件格式（如 \`.exe\`, \`.com\`, \`.bat\`, \`.app\`）。
 UI呈现：采用树状结构或图标网格展示，包含程序名称、图标及路径，支持搜索功能。

 模块二：进程追踪与窗口控制器 (Process Tracker & Window Manager)
 功能描述：满足需求“点击执行后跟踪画面并最大化”。
 设计逻辑：
 执行器：用户点击图标后，系统调用系统 API（如 Windows \`CreateProcess\`）启动目标应用。
 句柄捕获：通过进程 ID (PID) 轮询查找其主窗口句柄 (HWND)。
 窗口操作：一旦检测到窗口创建，立即发送系统指令（如 \`SW\_MAXIMIZE\`）将其强制最大化，确保视觉识别区域一致。
 模块三：多模态行为录制器 (Multimodal Recorder)
 功能描述：满足需求“定时与事件触发截屏存盘”。
 设计逻辑：
 双触发机制：
 1.  时间触发：后台线程每 1000ms 执行一次全屏/窗口截屏。
 2.  事件触发：通过系统钩子（Global Hooks）监听鼠标（点击、按下、释放）和键盘事件。一旦检测到动作，立即触发截屏（建议截取动作发生前一帧和后一帧），确保捕捉因果关系。
 数据存储结构：建立时序数据库，存储格式为 \`(Timestamp, Screenshot\_Path, Event\_Type, Mouse\_Coordinates, Key\_Value)\`。

 模块四：交互式标注工作台 (Interactive Annotation Workbench)
 功能描述：满足需求“记录步骤并由人标注目的与意义”。
 设计逻辑：
 回放界面：以时间轴形式展示录制的“屏幕\-动作”流。
 标注输入：在关键动作帧旁边提供文本框，要求用户输入：
 意图 (Intent)：这一步是为了做什么？（例如：“点击文件菜单”）
 推理 (Reasoning)：为什么要这么做？（例如：“因为需要保存当前文档”）
 数据清洗：系统自动剔除无效的静止画面或误操作，生成高质量的 \`<State（屏幕）, Action（动作）, Instruction（指令）\>\` 训练数据集。
 模块五：AI 模拟执行 Agent (AI Simulation Agent)
 功能描述：满足需求“模拟学习后跟随执行”。
 核心架构：基于 AI Agent 的 Plan-and-Execute（规划与执行） 模式 \[1\] 设计。
 工作流程：
 1.  感知 (Perception)：系统实时截取当前屏幕，传递给多模态大模型（VLM）
 2.  暂不考虑，也不外包 ++~~*规划 (Thinking)：模型结合用户的标注数据（记忆库），使用 CoT（思维链） \[1\] 进行推理。*~~++
 思考过程：“我现在看到了主界面，根据之前的学习，下一步应该是打开文件菜单。”
 3.  行动 (Action)：
 系统将推理结果转化为具体的 工具调用。
 参考 MCP (Model Context Protocol) 协议 \[1\] 的思想，将“鼠标点击”、“键盘输入”封装为标准化工具接口，由 Agent 调度执行。
 4.  反馈循环：执行动作后，再次截屏确认界面变化（例如确认菜单是否弹出），如果失败则触发重试或修正逻辑。

 3. 推荐技术栈
 UI/框架：Python (PyQt 或 Electron)
 系统控制：PyAutoGUI (模拟操作), pywin32 (窗口管理), pynput (事件监听)
 AI/模型：OpenAI GPT-4o 或开源 LLaVA (图像理解), LangChain (Agent 编排)
 4. 总结
该设计不仅仅是一个自动化脚本，而是一个具备推理能力的智能体。通过模块四的人工标注，您实际上是在为 Agent 构建“经验记忆”；模块五则利用这些记忆，配合 Agent 的规划能力（Plan-and-Execute），实现对复杂操作的稳健模仿和泛化执行。
jobCategory: 算法,AI,全栈开发,客户端开发,DevOps/MLOps

postTitle: 1000-1500/天 Python 爬虫工程师（兼职）
descContent:
🚀 寻找 Python 爬虫工程师 - 兼职/远程合作
你好！我是一名独立开发者，正在开发一个大规模舆情监控与分析系统。这是一个技术挑战性很高的项目，涉及爬虫、AI 、RPA 等多个领域。

由于项目规模较大，所以想找一些技术能力强、有经验的伙伴一起合作。

合作方式：兼职/远程，时间灵活，按项目/任务结算

🔍 需要的人才 岗位：Python 爬虫工程师（高级/架构师）🔥 急招 技术要求 必须技能：

✅ 3-5 年以上爬虫开发经验 ✅ 有大规模爬虫项目经验 ✅ 精通 JS 逆向：能破解 JS 加密、JSVMP 、参数加密 ✅
精通浏览器自动化：Playwright 、Selenium ，能模拟真实用户行为 ✅ 精通反爬虫对抗：处理 IP 封禁、账号封禁、验证码、设备指纹检测 ✅
精通分布式爬虫：Scrapy-Redis 、Celery ，能设计分布式架构 ✅ 有成本优化经验：降低代理 IP 成本、账号成本

加分项：

有舆情监控项目经验 有开源项目贡献 有技术博客、技术分享 薪资待遇 兼职：按项目/任务结算，具体面议 远程：完全远程，时间灵活
长期合作：如果合作愉快，可以长期合作 📝 如何申请 申请方式 邮箱：发送邮件到 anchorvr@gmail.com ，标题格式：[岗位名称] -
[你的名字] 申请材料 请提供以下材料：

技术简历：重点突出相关项目经验 技术作品： GitHub 主页（如果有开源项目更好） 技术博客（如果有技术分享更好） 项目案例（可以匿名，但要有技术细节）
自我介绍： 技术背景 项目经验 为什么想合作 期望薪资：兼职期望薪资（按项目或按小时） 面试流程 初步筛选：根据简历和技术作品筛选 技术面试：技术能力评估
合作洽谈：如果通过，洽谈合作方式和薪资

🎯 我们最看重什么 技术能力（最重要） 实战经验：有真实项目经验，不是只会理论 问题解决能力：遇到问题能快速找到解决方案
技术深度：对技术有深入理解，不是浅尝辄止 项目经验 大规模项目经验：有处理大规模数据的经验 复杂问题处理：有处理复杂技术问题的经验
成本优化经验：有优化成本的经验

性格特质 能独立解决问题：不需要手把手教 有责任心：按时完成项目任务 能团队协作：能与其他成员配合 学习能力强：技术更新快，需要不断学习

📞 联系方式 邮箱： anchorvr@gmail.com 期待与你的合作！ 🚀
jobCategory: 后端开发,数据开发,AI,DevOps/MLOps,运维

postTitle: 【远程全职】AI生图模型 - 全栈开发工程师
jobTitle: AI生图模型 - 全栈开发工程师
descContent:
【远程全职】AI图片生成APP - 全栈/前端开发工程师

关于我们

我们是一个早期创业团队，正在开发一款基于AI的高颜值图片生成应用（网页端）。我们的目标是帮助用户利用AI快速在社交媒体上起号并获得流量收益。团队核心成员有丰富的产品和AI应用经验，目前已有清晰的产品规划、技术框架和稳定客源。

我们在寻找

一位能够高效利用AI编程工具（如Cursor、Claude、GitHub Copilot）的全栈或前端开发工程师，与我们的技术负责人紧密配合，快速推进MVP开发。

你将负责

基于现有框架，完成网页端APP的前端界面开发
对接AI图片生成API（如Midjourney、Stable Diffusion等）
实现用户系统、图片管理等核心功能
与技术负责人协作，快速迭代和优化产品

我们希望你
精通Vibe Coding：熟练使用Cursor、Claude或GitHub Copilot等AI编程工具
技术扎实：3年以上Web开发经验，熟悉现代前端框架（React/Vue）
快速交付：能够在AI辅助下快速实现功能，注重结果
产品思维：理解用户需求，能将产品想法转化为技术实现
创业心态：自驱、灵活、愿意承担多种角色

加分项
有AI产品或图片处理相关项目经验
创业公司或早期项目经验
有高质量的GitHub开源项目
对AI生图模型、社交媒体运营有兴趣或了解
了解docker镜像，comfyUIAI框架等
base北京，深圳

我们提供
 薪资：15,000 - 30,000元/月（根据经验）
工作方式：全职远程，弹性工作时间
 成长空间：与团队共同成长，参与产品从0到1的全过程
作为技术合伙人，一起享受项目的收益

postTitle: Manager, Payroll Accounting at Camunda
descContent:
[**Register here**](https://camunda.com/wb-life-at-camunda/)!

Camunda is the **leader in enterprise agentic automation, orchestrating
complex business processes** , including high-value knowledge work, across
agents, people, and systems. By creating production-ready, enterprise-grade
agents with built-in governance, Camunda uniquely delivers trusted AI agents
for business-critical processes. **Over 700 leading innovators like Atlassian,
ING, and Vodafone, rely on Camunda** to slash time-to-value from months to
days, boost operational efficiency, and elevate customer experiences. Camunda
was named a****_**Visionary**_**** in the inaugural [**2025 Gartner® Magic
Quadrant™**](https://page.camunda.com/wp-2025-gartner-magic-quadrant-for-
boat)**** for Business Orchestration and Automation Technologies (BOAT).

  

**As a fully remote, global company, we’re rewriting the rules of modern
business.** Named [GP Bullhound’s 2024 Top 100 Next Unicorn
list,](https://www.gpbullhound.com/articles/top-100-next-unicorns-the-uk-
france-and-germany-lead-with-the-most-promising-technology-companies-in-
europe/) certified as a **Great Place to Work** , and recognized by [Flexa for
true flexibility](https://flexa.careers/companies/camunda), we’re growing fast
and looking for top talent to join our team. If you’re excited to do
meaningful work and make real impact, keep reading, **this role could be the
one you’ve been waiting for.**

**About the Role:**

At Camunda, we care deeply about doing impactful work together. As our
Manager, Payroll Accounting, you’ll build and lead a best-in-class payroll
accounting function that ensures accuracy, transparency, and trust at scale.
You’ll own the month-end close for payroll-related accounts, strengthen our
controls, and partner closely with People Operations, Accounting, FP&A, and
external payroll providers. If you love turning complexity into clarity,
improving processes, and helping teams succeed, this role is a chance to make
a visible, company-wide impact.

**What You Will Do:**

  * Own the global payroll accounting close end-to-end, including accruals, journal entries, reconciliations, variance analysis, and balance sheet integrity across all entities.

  * Balance hands-on execution with process leadership, especially during the transition period.

  * Establish and maintain clear, audit-ready documentation such as SOPs, RACIs, and process maps.

  * Ensure strong internal controls and audit readiness, maintaining clear documentation, standardized workflows, and consistent compliance with IFRS and local GAAP requirements.

  * Partner closely with People Operations/HR, Accounting, FP&A, and external payroll providers to resolve issues, validate payroll data, and deliver accurate, timely payroll results.

  * Lead process improvements and automation initiatives across payroll-to-ledger workflows, reducing manual effort, strengthening data quality, and increasing efficiency.

  * Define, monitor, and act on key payroll accounting metrics, turning operational data into clear insights that inform decisions and support scaling payroll operations.

**What You Will Bring to the Role:**

**Must Haves:**

  * Proven experience in multi-country payroll operations (US, DE, UK, SG + vendor models), including strong payroll accounting expertise (journal entries, accruals, reconciliations, cut-offs, variance analysis).

  * Strong general ledger skills and deep understanding of payroll accounting concepts (gross-to-net, taxes, benefits, withholdings, and employer costs).

  * Demonstrated ability to partner effectively with HR/People teams and external payroll providers to ensure compliance and solve complex issues.

  * Ability to oversee vendors, enforce quality standards, and resolve complex payroll issues.

  * Strong analytical mindset with the ability to trace root causes across payroll, accounting, and compliance.

  * Experience improving and/or automating payroll-to-GL processes and controls using HRIS and payroll systems.

**Nice to Haves:**

  * Experience in a global, fast-growing SaaS or technology environment.

  * Experience with Gusto, HiBob, NetSuite, or similar payroll/HRIS/ERP systems.

  * Experience leading system implementations, migrations, or automation projects.

  * Familiarity with benefits, pensions, commissions, or payroll compliance reporting.

  * Exposure to internal and external audits, including designing and operating effective controls.

  * People leadership experience and a coaching mindset.

#LI-JS1 #LI-Remote C1

**What We Have to Offer:**

**Compensation**

We offer competitive, fair, and transparent compensation. Salary ranges are
location-based, with Standard and Major markets (global tech hubs) reflecting
local competition.

**The Annual Total Target Cash**(base salary + 100% variable target, where
applicable) shown below spans from the minimum in a Standard market to the
maximum in a Major market. Final offers depend on **skills** , **experience**
, and **location** , and we typically hire in the first half of the range to
allow room for growth:

  * United States: $130,800.00 to $210,800.00 

  * Germany: €84,500.00 to €139,800.00 

  * United Kingdom: £82,100.00 to £135,100.00 

  * Singapore: S$162,400.00 to S$243,600.00

If you’re based elsewhere, you’ll be hired via
[**Remote.com**](http://Remote.com) (our global employer partner), and your
Talent Acquisition Partner will provide a personalized **Total Rewards
Calculator** after your first interview.

**Equity:** We also offer equity (where applicable) through our [**Virtual
Stock Option Plan
(VSOP)**](https://confluence.camunda.com/spaces/BP/pages/123315208/Virtual+Employee+Stock+Option+Plan+%E2%80%9CVSOP%E2%80%9D).

**Benefits & Perks**

We invest in your wellbeing, growth, and ability to connect, along with perks
that support you no matter where you’re based. Our benefits are globally
designed and locally delivered where applicable.

  * **Remote & Flexible: **Work from anywhere with the setup that suits you, **home office budget, co-working space support, and flexible time off** to recharge when you need it.

  * **In Person Connection:** We invest in meaningful face time through our **Annual Kickoff**(Vienna in 2025, Madrid in 2026!), **team offsites, and Camundi Connection Budgets** , including contributing to meetups while travelling,, and local gatherings with fellow Camundi.

  * **Health & Wellbeing:** Access locally tailored healthcare, **Modern Health for global mental wellbeing, and an annual fitness reimbursement.**

  * **Financial Security:** Retirement and pension plans (often with company contributions), plus life and disability insurance where relevant.

  * **Professional Growth:** Up to $/€/£1,000 per year for self-driven learning: courses, certifications, books, you decide!

  * **More of what we offer globally & in your country can be found **[**here**](https://confluence.camunda.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=110235989)**.**

_”Everyone is welcome at Camunda”_ — _it’s a celebrated component of our
culture. We strive to create an inclusive environment that empowers our
people. At Camunda, we honour diverse cultures and backgrounds and are proud
to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive
consideration without regard to gender, race, ethnicity, religion, belief,
sexual orientation, age, disability or any other protected characteristics
under applicable law. We are looking forward to your application!_

_**Come join us and be part of Camunda’s incredible journey: Make an impact at
a pivotal moment in our story!**_

postTitle: Head of Marketing at Celestia
descContent:
**About Celestia Labs**

Celestia is the first modular L1 blockchain, built for the extreme speed and
specialization required to take crypto mainstream. Today, more than 30
networks across exchanges, real-world assets, and consumer applications are
built on Celestia’s foundation.

  

**About the Team**

The Celestia Labs Team is remote first and highly distributed, with English as
our primary language for communication. We are looking for self-starters that
are excited about working in a fast-paced startup environment.

Much of the team lives and works in the European timezones. As such, team
members are expected to be available as needed for scheduled team meetings
between the general hours of 1pm-6pm CET.

  

**About You**

Celestia Labs is looking for an experienced Head of Marketing to lead our
marketing strategy and execution as we scale institutional adoption and
ecosystem growth. This role will own brand positioning, product marketing, and
growth initiatives that drive awareness among developers, enterprises, and
institutions globally.You'll be responsible for building and executing a
comprehensive marketing strategy that positions Celestia as leading blockchain
infrastructure - and you'll be the one executing it. The ideal candidate is a
rare blend of strategic thinker and hands-on executor: someone with
exceptional taste who can craft compelling marketing strategies and creative
direction, then roll up their sleeves to bring them to life through
outstanding written content, website updates, campaigns, and more.This is a
rebuilding opportunity. You'll inherit a clean slate to build the right
strategy, processes, and creative direction from the ground up. This is a lean
marketing function - you'll be both the strategist and the executor, working
cross-functionally to deliver high-quality work across all channels.

**About Celestia Labs**

Celestia is the first modular L1 blockchain, built for the extreme speed and
specialization required to take crypto mainstream. Today, more than 30
networks across exchanges, real-world assets, and consumer applications are
built on Celestia’s foundation.

  

**About the Team**

The Celestia Labs Team is remote first and highly distributed, with English as
our primary language for communication. We are looking for self-starters that
are excited about working in a fast-paced startup environment.

Much of the team lives and works in the European timezones. As such, team
members are expected to be available as needed for scheduled team meetings
between the general hours of 1pm-6pm CET.

  

**About You**

Celestia Labs is looking for an experienced Head of Marketing to lead our
marketing strategy and execution as we scale institutional adoption and
ecosystem growth. This role will own brand positioning, product marketing, and
growth initiatives that drive awareness among developers, enterprises, and
institutions globally.You'll be responsible for building and executing a
comprehensive marketing strategy that positions Celestia as leading blockchain
infrastructure - and you'll be the one executing it. The ideal candidate is a
rare blend of strategic thinker and hands-on executor: someone with
exceptional taste who can craft compelling marketing strategies and creative
direction, then roll up their sleeves to bring them to life through
outstanding written content, website updates, campaigns, and more.This is a
rebuilding opportunity. You'll inherit a clean slate to build the right
strategy, processes, and creative direction from the ground up. This is a lean
marketing function - you'll be both the strategist and the executor, working
cross-functionally to deliver high-quality work across all channels.

### Responsibilities

* Develop and execute Celestia's global marketing strategy across brand, product, and growth.
* Own both strategy and execution - from crafting creative campaigns to writing blog posts, social content, and website copy yourself.
* Drive ecosystem awareness and developer adoption through targeted campaigns, content, and community engagement.
* Build institutional credibility through thought leadership, strategic positioning, and tailored messaging for enterprise and financial services audiences.
* Own product marketing - translating Celestia's technical value proposition into clear, compelling narratives for different stakeholder groups.
* Lead growth marketing initiatives including performance marketing, partnerships, events strategy, and digital channels to expand reach and engagement.
* Write high-quality content across formats: blog posts, tweets, email campaigns, landing pages, and more. Strong writing skills are essential.
* Coordinate with external partners (e.g., design agencies) to execute website updates, creative assets, and campaign materials while maintaining creative direction and quality control.
* Develop and manage conference and events strategy to maximize Celestia's visibility and engagement with key audiences.
* Collaborate closely with BD, engineering, and ecosystem teams to align marketing efforts with business priorities and technical roadmap.
* Track marketing performance, optimize campaigns, and report on key metrics tied to ecosystem growth and business objectives.

### Who You Are

* 5+ years of marketing experience with a strong track record of both strategic thinking and hands-on execution.
* Exceptional marketing taste and creativity - you know what great marketing looks like and can develop innovative strategies and campaigns.
* Outstanding written communication skills - you can write compelling, clear content for diverse audiences (blog posts, social media, product messaging, etc.).
* Demonstrated success building and executing marketing strategies that drive measurable growth (awareness, adoption, engagement).
* Strong storytelling and positioning skills - you can take complex technical concepts and make them accessible and compelling.
* Experience across multiple marketing disciplines: brand, product marketing, growth/performance marketing, content, and events.
* Hands-on executor who thrives in a lean environment - you're comfortable working independently and doing both the thinking and the doing.
* Comfortable working in a fast-paced, dynamic startup environment with limited resources and high ambiguity.
* Self-starter who can build from the ground up - strategy, execution, creative direction, and processes.
* Crypto/web3 experience is a plus but not required - we value great marketing talent regardless of industry background.
* You're energized by the opportunity to rebuild and define what great marketing looks like at Celestia.

### Perks

* Flexible and remote work environment with multiple onsites each year
* Competitive salary and meaningful long-term compensation package
* Stipends for home office, coworking space, professional and personal growth
* 4 weeks annual vacation
* Being part of a collaborative, supportive team with opportunities for mentorship and professional growth
* 401k and healthcare coverage for US team members

While experience in the blockchain space is preferred – having general
excitement about web3 and modular blockchain technology is a must!
jobCategory: 市场营销,用户增长,内容创作,区块链

postTitle: Staff Engineer for ELS (worldwide remote, work anywhere) at CloudLinux
jobTitle: Staff Engineer for ELS (worldwide remote, work anywhere) at CloudLinux
descContent:
CloudLinux is a global remote-first company. We are driven by our principles:
do the right thing, employees first, we are remote first, and we deliver high
volume, low-cost Linux infrastructure and security products that help
companies to increase the efficiency of their operations. Every person on our
team supports each other and does what we can to ensure we all are successful.
We are truly a great place to work! Check out our website for more information
<https://cloudlinux.com/>  
  
We're seeking a hands-on Staff Engineer who can lead the development of
complex, cross-cutting systems in the company while also owning the product
vision and roadmap. This role is ideal for someone who operates as a Senior
Developer (70%) and a Technical Product Owner (30%) — a builder who can gather
and understand the requests from stakeholders and transform them into a proof-
of-concept, later developing it into production-grade code. The person should
think strategically, engage with stakeholders, and drive product direction.  
  
**Responsibilities** :

  * Gather requirements from multiple stakeholders on a project
  * Lead architectural design and technical direction for high-impact initiatives
  * Guide multiple engineering teams in the adoption of scalable, maintainable solutions
  * Collaborate across teams to gather requirements and align on priorities
  * Promote engineering excellence through design reviews, mentorship, and best practices
  * Continuously explore and evaluate new technologies, methodologies, and tools
  * Ensure that all solutions are robust, secure, and performant in production environments
  * Champion a culture of automation, reliability, and continuous improvement

**Requirements**

**Requirements**

  * Programming Languages: Proficiency in Python is a must. Knowledge of any other programming languages is a plus.
  * Hands-on Engineering Leadership: Requires a senior-level engineer proficient in designing, implementing, and maintaining scalable software systems. Regular code contributions and leading by example in both architecture and implementation are expected
  * Technical Product Ownership: Involves shaping product direction — gathering and refining requirements, translating them into technical goals, and aligning them with broader engineering strategies. Experience in technical product management or direct ownership of product roadmaps is highly valued
  * Full Lifecycle Responsibility: Encompasses ownership of the entire lifecycle of major components, from initial concept through prototyping, delivery, and ongoing evolution. A balance between short-term iteration and long-term scalability and extensibility is essential
  * Cross-Functional Collaboration: Demands active communication with engineering teams, product managers, and stakeholders across departments. Requires the ability to align different viewpoints, prioritize effectively, and turn feedback into actionable plans
  * Strategic Thinking + Execution: While the primary focus remains on building, it's important to step back, understand broader product and organizational goals, and make informed engineering trade-offs within that context  
  
  

**Benefits**

**What's in it for you?**

  * A focus on professional development.
  * Interesting and challenging projects.
  * Fully remote work with flexible working hours, that allows you to schedule your day and work from any location worldwide.
  * Paid 24 days of vacation per year, 10 days of national holidays, and unlimited sick leaves.
  * Compensation for private medical insurance.
  * Co-working and gym/sports reimbursement.
  * Budget for education.
  * The opportunity to receive a reward for the most innovative idea that the company can patent.  

_By applying for this position, you consent to the processing of your personal
data as described in our Privacy Policy (), which provides detailed
information on how we maintain and handle your data._
jobCategory: 后端开发,DevOps/MLOps,运维,产品经理,安全

postTitle: Senior Development Manager at Crytek
descContent:
We are looking for a Senior Development Manager to join our CRYENGINE team in
our state-of-the-art Frankfurt studio. As Senior Development Manager, you will
drive the delivery of one or more sub teams, ensuring alignment with
CRYENGINE's overall strategy and milestones. You will be responsible for
planning, tracking, and improving delivery, implementing the project’s
operational model, and fostering an environment of collaboration and
excellence across disciplines.

### Responsibilities

* Own and drive the delivery of your assigned sub team’s goals, ensuring alignment with project-wide milestones and priorities.
* Develop detailed delivery plans, schedules, and workflows to meet objectives on time and within budget.
* Coordinate dependencies and collaboration with other sub teams to ensure smooth integration of work.
* Implement and maintain the operational model at the sub team level, ensuring consistent processes and efficient workflows.
* Collaborate with the Development Director on resource and talent planning to meet delivery needs.
* Foster a healthy and motivated team culture aligned with Crytek’s values and CRYENGINE’s technical vision.
* Anticipate and manage risks, proactively resolving bottlenecks and delivery issues.
* Ensure deliverables meet agreed quality standards and integrate seamlessly into the project.
* Maintain transparent communication with stakeholders, providing regular progress updates and reports.
* Promote operational excellence by identifying process improvements and empowering team members to perform at their best.
,

### Requirements

* 5+ years of experience as a Senior Project Manager, Senior Producer, or Senior Development Manager in game development.
* Background in technical production or programming.
* Proven track record of successfully delivering complex, multi-disciplinary projects in technical development environment.
* Strong understanding of project management methodologies (Agile, Kanban, SAFe, Waterfall) and their practical application at team level.
* Excellent organizational and leadership skills, with the ability to motivate and align cross-functional teams.
* Strong communication and collaboration skills across disciplines and stakeholders.
* Demonstrated ability to identify risks and drive solutions proactively.
* Experience with resource planning, scheduling, and task prioritization.
* Fluent English skills and strong interpersonal communication abilities.
* Willingness to relocate to Frankfurt am Main, Germany.
,

### Pluses

* Familiarity with AAA game engines.
* Experience managing distributed or hybrid teams.
* Strong interest in online multiplayer shooters

**What you can expect from us**

  

**Career Path**

Your professional development is important to us, so we have laid out a career
plan to help you progress towards your goals and objectives.

  

**Relocation Support**

We offer a relocation budget and full coverage of flights to Frankfurt for you
and your family.

You can expect extensive assistance with visa, work permits, and communication
with authorities during the relocation process, as well as help settling into
Germany (e.g. setting up appointments with banks, government agencies,
schools, landlords, finding apartments etc.).

  

**Company Apartment**

To help you get settled, we provide you with a fully furnished company
apartment during your first three months in Frankfurt.

  

**Public Transport Pass**

Discover Frankfurt by bus, tram and metro – free of charge.

**Gym Card**

A healthy body is a healthy mind. We offer a membership at the premium gym
chain Fitness First in Germany. Work out, join group fitness classes, or relax
in the wellness facilities.

  

**State-of-the-art Office**

We’ve recently moved into a brand-new, modern office located in the heart of
Frankfurt. Our new workspace is designed to inspire creativity and
collaboration, with open areas, quiet zones, and top-tier facilities — all
just steps away from public transport, restaurants, bars and cultural
hotspots.

**International Environment**

We truly embody diversity at Crytek. With employees from over 42 different
countries, we define ourselves by our cultural diversity.

**German Classes**

Understanding the local culture will make your stay abroad more enjoyable, and
Crytek supports that by offering German language courses for you and your
family.

**Events**

Join us on our exciting company events, including new starter breakfasts,
summer and winter parties, our annual trip to Gamescom in Cologne, and many
more!

  

**Vacation Days**

At our Frankfurt office you can enjoy 24 days of vacation per year, and every
2 years you get 1 more (up to a maximum of 28 days). You will also have on
average 10 public holidays on top of the days you take off.
jobCategory: 项目管理,客户端开发,技术支持

postTitle: CTO (100% Remote outside of Canada) at Wishpond
jobTitle: CTO (100% Remote outside of Canada) at Wishpond
descContent:
**SalesCloser.ai currently has the position of CTO available, and we’re
excited to tell you about it!**

**OVERVIEW**

We’re seeking a technical leader who combines strategic thinking with a
willingness to dive into the work when needed. This fully remote role leads
SalesCloser.ai’s engineering, data, IT, and platform operations, while also
staying close to the codebase, architecture, and day-to- day development
rhythms.

  

The CTO will help shape the technical direction of a rapidly growing marketing
technology product and partner closely with Product, Sales, and Customer
Success to ensure our technology decisions directly support customer value and
business priorities. This role requires someone who can balance long-term
technical vision with near-term execution, reliability, and iteration.

**RESPONSIBILITIES**

• Partner with company leadership to define and communicate
[SalesCloser.ai](http://SalesCloser.ai)’s technical vision and ensure
alignment with business goals.

• Oversee global Engineering, DevOps, Data/Analytics, QA, Security, and IT
functions with an emphasis on collaboration, accountability, and healthy team
processes.

• Lead architectural decisions and guide the evolution of scalable, secure,
and cost-efficient systems.

• Co-own the technology roadmap with Product, ensuring clear prioritization
across innovation, customer needs, and operational constraints.

• Champion strong engineering practices including CI/CD, testing automation,
observability, documentation, and maintainable code standards.

• Ensure effective execution of development cycles, with predictable delivery
and measurable value.

• Oversee cloud infrastructure, system reliability, and operational
excellence, maintaining strong SLAs and minimal downtime.

• Build and refine development processes that enable fast iteration and
continuous improvement.

• Manage core technical budgets, vendor tools, cloud costs, and procurement.

• Strengthen our data capabilities across analytics engineering, reporting,
and machine learning opportunities.

• Implement and maintain strong security, privacy, and compliance practices
across platforms and internal systems.

• Work cross-functionally with Sales, Marketing, Customer Success, and
Operations to ensure technology supports a frictionless customer experience.

• Recruit, mentor, and develop engineering talent while fostering a culture of
learning, innovation, and ownership.

• Assess emerging technologies and lead initiatives that help
[SalesCloser.ai](http://SalesCloser.ai) stay competitive.

• Contribute directly to the codebase and architectural work as
needed—especially during critical projects, high-impact initiatives, or to
unblock teams.

• Perform other duties as required to support technology excellence and
business success.

**QUALIFICATIONS**

• 7–10+ years of engineering leadership experience, including managing
distributed teams.

• Background in SaaS, MarTech, AdTech, or fast-paced, high-growth software
environments.

• Deep experience in modern software development, cloud infrastructure (AWS,
GCP, or Azure), and distributed, high-availability architectures.

• Strong understanding of product development practices, agile methodologies,
and technical project execution.

• Hands-on experience implementing engineering best practices: CI/CD, DevOps,
IaC, observability, and test automation.

• Track record of aligning technical initiatives with product and business
priorities.

• Strong leadership and people-development skills.

• Excellent written and verbal communication, with the ability to translate
technical concepts for non-technical stakeholders.

• Strong analytical and decision-making capabilities.

• Experience with technical budgeting, tooling, vendor evaluation, and
resource planning.

• Demonstrated commitment to quality, customer-centric design, and innovation.

• Highly organized, self-directed, and able to thrive in an evolving
environment.

• Fluent in English (spoken and written); knowledge of a second language is a
plus.

  

**WORK ENVIRONMENT**

• Given the nature of this role, it is expected that the successful candidate
will provide their own workstation, computer, headset, and have a fast and
reliable internet connection. This position may be required to download and
utilize company software.

• Due to the nature of this role, we may verify backgrounds, including
conducting employment reference, criminal record and credit checks.

• Once hired, the successful candidate must provide a valid government-issued
photo ID as part of their onboarding process.

• The individual must be prepared to work standard business hours based on
Pacific time.

  

**GREAT REASONS TO APPLY FOR THIS ROLE**

• Fully remote position allowing you to **work from your home anywhere in the
world !**

• Exciting and dynamic environment with a great leadership team

• Comprehensive training program and regular performance reviews to facilitate
your success

• Competitive compensation based on experience and proven abilities

• Great referral programs with incentives and bonuses

• Unbelievable product discounts when you use our products for your own
business

• A global workforce of multi-cultural and talented colleagues

• A close-knit operation with amazing growth opportunities for your personal
development

• A high-growth SaaS technology company publicly traded on the TSX Venture
Exchange

• Corporate headquarters in beautiful Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada

  

**ABOUT US**

SalesCloser is an advanced conversational AI platform that acts as a virtual
sales agent, capable of delivering personalized sales calls, demos, and
follow-ups in real time and in multiple languages. The platform enables
businesses to automate and scale their sales operations, improving efficiency,
reducing hiring costs, and driving higher conversion rates.

  

Powered by advanced AI technology and a growing portfolio of patent
applications, SalesCloser delivers a scalable, high-margin solution designed
to redefine how companies engage with buyers and customers across a range of
business interactions.

  

For more information, visit the SalesCloser website at:
[https://salescloser.ai](https://salescloser.ai/).

  

**APPLICATION PROCESS**

**If you are interested in applying for this exciting opportunity, please
provide an updated resume IN ENGLISH (PDF or Word formats only), quoting the
position title in the subject line of your cover letter**

****

[SalesCloser.ai](http://SalesCloser.ai) is an equal-opportunity employer
committed to hiring a diverse workforce and sustaining an inclusive culture
that does not discriminate on the basis of disability, status, or any other
basis protected under legislation

We thank all applicants in advance for their interest in this position;
however, due to the volume of applications we receive, we are unable to
respond to phone, email, or agency inquiries.

  

**Internal Applications close on Wednesday, December 03, 2025, at 5:00 pm
Pacific Time**

postTitle: **Python 人工智能开发工程师（远程全职｜企业级智能文档处理方向）
jobTitle: Python 人工智能开发工程师
descContent:
**
======================================

**工作性质：远程全职（居家办公）**  
**工作地点：不限（优先浙江 / 上海，可定期线下沟通）**  
**作息制度：周一至周五，双休**

* * *

**【公司简介】**
----------

我们是一家面向海外市场的企业级数据处理技术公司，致力于通过 **智能文档识别、OCR 图像处理、RAG 知识增强、智能问答系统、会议纪要生成** 等 AI 能力，为全球客户提供高效可靠的数据自动化解决方案。

我们希望通过更先进的 AI 技术，将企业繁杂信息处理由 “繁” 变 “简”，构建高可用、可扩展的智能处理平台。

* * *

**【岗位职责】**
----------

1.  **智能文档处理系统开发**
    
    *   基于 OCR、LLM、RAG、智能代理（AI Agent）构建企业级文档识别、归档、知识问答系统。
        
    *   开发与优化智能摘要、会议纪要、智能分类、结构化抽取等 AI 应用能力。
        
2.  **AI 模型工程化与系统集成**
    
    *   能够将 LLM 能力与业务系统深度集成，实现自动化流程编排。
        
    *   参与构建高可用的 AI 服务，包括模型调用、任务队列、消息系统等。
        
3.  **全栈式工程能力**
    
    *   熟练使用 Python、TypeScript 完成后端与必要的前端集成开发。
        
    *   设计高质量 API、微服务架构、数据接口与自动化处理流程。
        
4.  **多云部署与工程化**
    
    *   有 Azure、AWS、GCP 任一主流云平台的实际开发经验。
        
    *   负责模型上线、服务部署、性能优化与监控。
        
5.  **独立推进项目**
    
    *   能够根据业务需求独立拆解任务、设计技术方案、推动项目从需求到落地上线。
        

* * *

**【任职要求】**
----------

### **必备要求：**

1.  **3 年以上 Python 实际项目经验**，熟悉 FastAPI / Flask 等常用框架。
    
2.  **深入理解大语言模型（LLM）原理与应用场景**，熟悉 OpenAI、Anthropic、Azure OpenAI、Llama、Qwen 等主流模型。
    
3.  熟悉 **RAG、Embedding、向量数据库（Pinecone / Qdrant / FAISS）** 的技术路线与实战经验。
    
4.  有智能知识库、OCR 文档处理、AI Agent 项目经验。
    
5.  熟练使用 TypeScript，有跨端或全栈开发经验优先。
    
6.  熟悉 **微服务架构**、RESTful API 设计，有良好的工程化能力。
    
7.  熟悉 **云平台（AWS / Azure / GCP）** 的部署、监控、服务编排。
    
8.  能够独立负责项目，从需求 → 开发 → 上线全流程。
    

* * *

**【加分项】**
---------

*   有企业级 AI 数据处理项目经验：OCR、文档结构化、智能问答、知识库等。
    
*   熟悉 LangChain、LlamaIndex、Flowise、AI Agent 框架。
    
*   有前端开发能力（React / Vue / Next.js）。
    
*   有海外项目经验或英文能力较好。
    
*   能承担小规模团队的技术管理或架构设计工作。
    

* * *

**【薪资待遇】**
----------

*   参考范围：**19,000 ～ 25,000 RMB/月**
    
*   若具备高阶能力（可承担 AI 架构 / 团队带领），薪资可进一步开放。
    
*   以最终技术面试表现为准。
    

* * *

**【合作方式】**
----------

支持以下任一方式：

### **① 远程技术服务合作（当前默认方式）**

*   可开具技术服务发票（个体户 / 工作室 / 企业均可）
    
*   或拥有美元收款账户（Wise / PayPal / 香港账户 / USDT 也可沟通）
    

### **② 未来可转为正式劳动合同**

若能稳定线下到上海每周 3 天以上，可转为全职劳动合同，缴纳五险一金，享受公司正式员工待遇。
    

* * *

**【面试流程】**
----------

1.  **笔试 / Demo 测试（必做）**
    
    *   包含 AI 技术能力、Python 工程能力、RAG/知识库实战题。
        
2.  **线上技术面试（Google Meet）**
    
    *   技术负责人进行深入评估。
        
3.  **最终确认与合同签署**
    

* * *

**【投递方式】**
----------

请附上简历及相关项目作品（GitHub / Demo 链接），我们将尽快联系您。
company: 企业级数据处理技术公司

postTitle: 【远程全职】iOS 全栈工程师（相机/图像视频方向）
jobTitle: iOS 全栈工程师（相机/图像视频方向）
descContent:
公司 / 项目介绍
我们是一个小而精的产品团队（亚洲区时区 GMT+8），在做一款「智能摄影 co-pilot」：帮助用户在旅行、约会、探店等真实场景里，用更少的试错拍到更好看的照片与短视频。

产品核心在于：相机能力（拍摄/录像/后处理）+ 实时引导（构图、姿势、光线、道具建议）+ 交互体验（轻量、不卡顿、可离线）。

岗位类型/项目预算

类型：远程全职
时间：周一到周五，其余弹性
合作方式：劳动合同或远程雇佣（视候选人所在地与资质）
项目预算：¥30,000 （等同于一个月的全职工作)
     
你将负责什么
1.  iOS 端相机模块开发：拍照/录像、对焦曝光、变焦、HDR、音视频、权限与相册链路等
2.  实时图像处理与性能优化：预览流、滤镜/增强、帧率/功耗/温度控制、内存与线程治理
3.  端侧能力整合：Vision/AR/ML 推理（如需要），做出“实时提示/引导”的产品体验
4.  “全栈”部分：参与后端 API 设计与落地（账号、云同步、素材管理、计费或订阅等），能独立把功能闭环
5.  工程质量：可测试、可观测、可持续迭代的工程体系（崩溃、日志、埋点、灰度）
    
硬性要求
3 年+ iOS 开发经验，能独立交付完整 App/核心模块，有上线作品（TestFlight/商店/作品集均可）
熟练 Swift（含 Concurrency）、UIKit/SwiftUI 至少一套，理解 iOS 性能与系统机制
相机/视频方向扎实：AVFoundation（采集/编码/渲染/同步）、CoreImage/Metal（至少了解其一）
能写后端或熟悉基本服务端能力：REST/gRPC 概念、鉴权、数据库/对象存储、部署排障
沟通清晰、能远程自驱，交付有节奏（日报不是重点，关键是稳定产出）
    
面试方式（
站内私信：请留言或解锁联系方式，发 1) 简历/GitHub 2) 代表作品
15–20 分钟语音沟通
    
申请方式（遵守社区规则：不公开联系方式）
请直接在电鸭「申请该职位」或站内私信我。初筛通过后我们再交换邮箱/微信进一步沟通。

postTitle: 远程兼职 UI 设计师（按次结算）
jobTitle: 远程兼职 UI 设计师
descContent:
一、岗位简介

我们正在寻找长期合作的 远程兼职 UI 设计师，主要负责移动端 / Web 端产品的界面设计。
以项目 / 任务为单位结算，适合有稳定本职工作、但希望利用空闲时间接单的设计师。

二、工作内容

1.根据产品需求文档或原型，完成页面的 UI 视觉设计（含颜色、字体、组件样式等）。
2.输出设计稿与切图（Figma / Sketch / XD 等皆可），并保证层级和命名清晰，方便前端实现。
3.根据反馈进行 小幅度迭代与优化（一般 1–2 轮为主）。
4.参与简单的交互动效设计或补充界面说明文档（如有需要）。
5.沟通工具中保持基本在线回复，确认需求与验收结果。

三、任职要求
1.3 年及以上 UI 设计经验，有完整的 App 或 Web 项目作品。
2.熟练使用 Figma / Sketch / Photoshop 等主流设计工具。
3.熟悉 iOS / Android 基本设计规范，理解响应式 / 自适应布局。
4.审美在线，风格偏简洁、干净，能够根据产品定位调整设计方向。
5.具备良好的沟通能力和自我驱动能力，能按时交付设计成果。

四、加分项（非必需）
1.有金融、工具类、SaaS 等产品设计经验。
2.了解基础前端（如组件拆分、栅格系统），与开发沟通无障碍。
3.具备 icon 设计或插画能力。
4.能长期稳定接单，每周有固定可支配时间。

五、工作方式与时间
工作方式：完全远程，线上沟通与交付。
时间安排：按任务安排，可在自己空闲时间完成，但需遵守双方约定的交付时间。

六、结算方式
结算模式：按次 / 按项目结算，在每个任务开始前明确：
工作范围（页面数量、复杂度）
交付物（设计稿格式、切图、文档等）

七、投递方式
可电我查看联系方式与邮箱，或留言简单介绍后联系
个人简历（注明目前状态和可接单时间）；
代表性作品集或作品链接（需包含至少 1–2 个完整项目）；
期望 单次/单页 价格区间或常用计价方式

postTitle: 鱼饵在线定制器（HTML5 Canvas 绘图工具）
descContent:
本项目需要开发一个嵌入 WordPress 的在线绘图定制器，用户可在渔饵线框区域内进行自定义上色、绘画、添加文字与图片等操作。核心功能包括：

⸻

     ① 绘图工具（重点功能）
	•	两种画笔（仿 PS）
	•	硬边圆笔刷（Hard Round）
	•	柔边圆笔刷（Soft Round，带 Feather/Softness 可调）
	•	画笔支持：大小可调、透明度可调
	•	支持 Undo / Redo
	•	支持清空绘画层（重置后只保留渔饵线框及底纹）
	•	绘画区域必须被严格限制在 SVG Mask（鱼饵线框区域） 中，不能绘制到外部

⸻

     ② 多图层系统（Canvas + 图片混合）

需实现独立图层结构：
	1.	Layer1：鱼饵线框（SVG）+ 遮罩区域（Mask）
	2.	Layer2：底纹1（电镀）
	3.	Layer3：底纹2（烫金）
	4.	Layer4：底纹3（花纹图案，自动裁切，不超出绘制区域）
	5.	Layer5：用户绘画层（Canvas）
	6.	Layer6：用户上传图片（支持拖拽/缩放/旋转）
	7.	Layer7：覆盖层（彩片/条纹等选择性覆盖，也支持拖拽/缩放/旋转）
	8.	Layer8：眼睛层

要求：
	•	图层之间互不干扰
	•	画笔绘制永远属于 Layer5
	•	各层透明度可调

⸻

      ③ 文本工具
	•	插入文字，可移动、缩放、旋转
	•	多字体选择
	•	可添加特效：浮雕（Emboss）、斜面（Bevel）、描边、阴影等

⸻

     ④ 导出与提交（前端 + 后端）

用户完成定制后点击“提交”，需实现：

前端生成：
	•	PNG 图片（透明背景，包含所有图层）
	•	JSON 文件（保存图层状态、绘制路径、用户选择等）

前端与后端交互：
	•	将 PNG + JSON + 用户信息（姓名/邮箱/电话/备注等）
POST 到 WordPress 后台

后端（WordPress）需实现：
	•	保存 PNG 到媒体库或指定目录
	•	保存 JSON 到数据库
	•	保存用户填写的资料
	•	后台创建一个列表页面可查看所有用户提交记录

     ⑤ 支持多产品渔饵模型（至少几十款）
	•	不同产品有不同 SVG 线框与遮罩
	•	通过 URL 参数切换，如：
/design?model=32

⑥ WordPress 嵌入

需提供一个可在 WordPress 中使用的嵌入方式（iframe 或 shortcode 均可）。

参考网站：https://www.vipertackle.com/custom-crank/paint?i=32
jobCategory: 前端开发,全栈开发,UI&UX,设计,项目管理

postTitle: 全职居家远程办公课程销售+周末双休五险
jobTitle: 全职居家远程办公课程销售+周末双休五险
descContent:
此岗位是全职居家办公模式，需自备电脑和手机设备，符合请再投递！  
岗位内容：  
1.公司有专项的团队负责获客资源，课程顾问主要电话结合微信沟通，销售公司课程产品；

3.擅于挖掘用户需求，能够引导激发用户兴趣并持续跟进服务，促成报名；  
4.根据公司制定的销售目标，配合团队完成销售任务。  
任职要求：  
1、统招大专及以上学历，2年以上销售经验，熟悉销售流程和技巧；  
2、具有空杯心态，良好的学习能力（能够耐心学习行业知识），具备良好的沟通能力，抗压能力强；  
3、够积极配合工作（我们需要的是积极的全职合作伙伴，如果只想找短期或兼职工作者请勿投）；  
4、自信，并热爱销售工作，有成为过销冠、有成人职业技能培训行业经验的优先。  
工作时间：9:00-17:30 周末双休+法定节假日全休+春节带薪假不低于11天，不加班！  
薪资待遇：  
1.入职时----享受五险  
2.放假时----享有法定节假日，节日礼品  
3.疲惫时----公司关怀，带薪假日  
4.年底啦----高端大气上档次的年会，低调奢华有内涵的年货  
薪资范围：一般：10000-15000元/月，优秀：2w-3w/月  
底薪：5000元/月（浮动）  
社保类型：五险  
提成方式：按单量提成  
我们是谁：  
Kelote集团是国内知名的SAP软件实施供应商，专注于企业互联网转  
型及信息化解决方案。以ERP服务为核心 ，致力于向国内外众多客户  
提供企业关键业务应用的方案与服务，辐射 IT 规划、IT 开发、咨询  
服务、本地专业服务、商务智能平台等方面的业务内容，为用户打造  
提供完整、专业、灵活、有效的整体解决方案。  
我们的优势：  
（1）sap（思爱普）行业发展好，目前是国内外最大的企业资源计划（ERP）管理系统，国内需求量大；  
（2）不需要自己找资源，公司会分配，不会割韭菜；  
（3）集团化企业，技术、人才培养，人才孵化三位一体；  
岗位发展路径：  
（1）公司有规范的发展路线，横向可以往模块产品负责人发展，纵向可以往高级顾问-顾问组长-城市负责人发展；  
（2）顾问有相应的考核机制，考核后可以涨薪或晋升。

postTitle: 要找 Flutter 和 Java ，就一个要求，靠谱就行！
jobTitle: Flutter 和 Java 开发者
descContent:
最近在做一个社交类项目，需要把第三方 IM 和短视频集成进来，进度不理想，需要扩员啦。

前端目前用的是 Flutter,如果对 Tencent IM 这类即时通信体系有点感觉会加分（哪怕只是熟悉它的逻辑和特点，也能节省很多沟通成本）。

后端用 Java ，包含业务核心、协议封装、以及一些需要耐心推敲的细节。

项目目前是远程协作模式，我们更像是 小队共创，很多东西先落地、再打磨、再讨论。希望你：

真的热爱技术本身，而不是只盯着套路和模板。

反应快、理解强、脑子灵活，能把复杂问题拆到可执行的最小单元。

不需要你很年轻，但 过于“年长经验型”反而容易有代沟，我更看重你够聪明、够变通。

远程可胜任，能用文字和代码进行高密度沟通，不需要坐班(当然愿意坐班也没问题，坐标北京)。

如果你觉得自己正好是这种「思维和能力挺能打」的类型，欢迎私信聊聊——别问薪资，因为我们大概率会直接谈 你负责哪块，我负责哪块，怎么一起把它做到爽。

postTitle: 找支付工程师解决小程序不能支付的问题:
descContent:
找支付工程师解决小程序不能支付的问题:
有一个猪肉店营业执照的认证的小程序，部署在收银设备的第三方服务商上以及使用其支付通道。
现在遇到的问题是：用户在小程序下单，提交后无法支付。
跟第三方支付的业务沟通的结果是：业务员说这是微信支付的风控，他们没找到微信的人工客服，没找到风控的理由，无能为力。
其它生鲜，水果行业的客户，没有遇到这个支付报错的问题。
猪肉店商家在使用另一张营业执照认证的小程序，还是会遇到相同无法支付的问题。
有能解决这个问题的支付工程师没？
预算:1K
jobCategory: 前端开发,技术支持,金融

postTitle: Senior Amazon Brand Manager at GNO Partners
jobTitle: Senior Amazon Brand Manager at GNO Partners
descContent:
Why Join Us?

  * Fully remote Amazon consulting agency.
  * High-performance culture: hard work, speed, over-delivery, and trust.
  * Competitive Compensation: Total OTE of $220,000-$300,000+.
    * Base Salary: $120,000
    * Performance-Based Earnings: Realistically getting an extra $180,000 per year based on performance, and more (no cap).

  * Work with a team that lives and breathes Amazon while having fun doing it.

Who We’re Looking For:

We are seeking a Senior Amazon Brand Manager who deeply understands Amazon
FBA, enjoys strategizing for brand growth, and can tackle complex challenges
with precision and speed.

Key Skills & Experience:

  * Organic Ranking Mastery: Product launches, ranking strategies, and algorithm insights.
  * Amazon PPC Expertise: Strategy + execution, proven hands on experience managing minimum $50K+/mo budgets.
  * Brand Management: Experience managing Private Label brands generating a minimum of $10M in annual revenue
  * Logistics & Backend: Strong grasp of COGs, fees, inventory, and profitability (P&L) optimization.
  * Amazon Catalog Troubleshooter: Proven expertise in diagnosing and resolving complex catalog issues.

Responsibilities:

  * Lead weekly strategy calls with clients, ensuring project progress.
  * Solve Amazon challenges and guide clients through key projects.
  * Track progress and provide clear next steps.
  * Offer daily support via Slack & Email.
  * Continuously improve our consulting systems.
  * Attend weekly training and team meetings.

Qualifications:

  * Full-time, remote.
  * 3+ years Amazon FBA experience, managing brands $10M+ in revenue minimum.
  * PPC expertise: Managed $50k monthly ad budgets minimum.
  * Seller Central pro: Navigate and optimize quickly.
  * Strong project management & client communication skills.
  * Positive, proactive, and client-focused personality.
  * Fluent in English.
  * Ambitious and driven, with a relentless work ethic to maximize earning potential

If you're an Amazon expert, you're driven, strategic, and thrive in high-
growth environments, we want you on our team!

Please submit your application through Breezy HR:  
👉 **[https://gno-partners.breezy.hr/p/154fdc8fa066-senior-amazon-brand-
manager?state=published](https://gno-partners.breezy.hr/p/154fdc8fa066-senior-
amazon-brand-manager)**

____

__*For referrals, email us at HR @ gnopartners.com_ _and CC the candidate
you’re introducing.__

postTitle: Marketing Operations Manager at SafetyWing
descContent:
### 🧘 Benefits beyond base pay:

  * Fully remote work environment – work from anywhere globally
  * Our own global safety net, giving you worldwide health, income, and travel coverage
  * A minimum of four weeks of vacation per year
  * A new laptop when you need one
  * Potential to unlock equity compensation, yearly home office allowance and more!  
  

🚀 We look forward to hearing from you!

At **SafetyWing (YC W18)** , we’re building a global social safety net for
remote workers—simple health, insurance, and retirement products designed to
replace national welfare systems. Our mission is to remove geographical
borders as a barrier to equal opportunity and freedom for everyone. If we
succeed, we believe this will be one of the most important tasks of our time.

  

### 🌎 About this Role:

As the **Marketing Operations Manager** at **SafetyWing** , you will bring
structure, flow, and quality to our growing marketing department. Your role
will be essential to turning our marketing strategy into coordinated outputs -
by managing timelines, aligning teams, and ensuring campaigns ship on time and
at a high standard. You will be the operational backbone that keeps our
marketing engine running smoothly and predictably.  
  
👩‍💻 **Your responsibilities will include:**

  * Owning timelines, deliverables, and communications for all marketing projects
  * Coordinating cross-functional teams (design, copy, web, analytics, ambassadors) and ensuring aligned, timely delivery
  * Establishing repeatable workflows for campaign launches, asset requests, QA, and reporting
  * Supporting campaign execution across email, social, influencer, and content channels, ensuring approvals and assets are ready
  * Acting as the communication hub between leadership and wider marketing contributors, keeping everyone in sync
  * Providing hands-on execution support such as brief copy edits, HubSpot setups, and final QA checks before launch

  

### 🧪 We are looking for someone who:

  * Has 4 - 6 years of experience in marketing coordination, project management, or integrated marketing roles
  * Has proven ability to manage multiple concurrent projects and stakeholders
  * Understands marketing campaign structures, timelines, and workflows deeply
  * Communicates proactively, flags issues early, and follows through relentlessly
  * Is detail-oriented without being bureaucratic; values clarity and quality
  * Thrives in fast-paced, distributed team environments
  * Bonus points if you have experience with HubSpot, Notion, Figma, and Slack or familiarity with marketing performance metrics, basic copyediting or QA experience

  
**😀 We like to work with people who:**

  * Want to help build a global social safety net on the Internet.
  * Think for themselves instead of copying others.
  * Are willing to try new things, even with the risk of failure.
  * Are intellectually curious and open to new ideas.
  * Are creative and bold in the face of any problems.
  * Have strong integrity and do the right thing.
jobCategory: 市场营销,运营,项目管理

postTitle: UI 设计师（AI + 命理 + 虚拟陪伴方向）
jobTitle: UI 设计师（AI + 命理 + 虚拟陪伴方向）
descContent:
**岗位职责**
--------

1.  **负责产品整体视觉设计**  
    包含 App / Web 的界面、组件库、插画、动效，确保整体风格统一，符合「命理·治愈·未来感」的品牌调性。
    
2.  **参与产品体验设计**  
    与产品、模型、研发紧密协作，设计 AI 互动场景（如：算命对话、命盘展示、情绪陪伴界面）、人格呈现方式、虚拟形象 UI 等。
    
3.  **构建品牌视觉体系**  
    完成 Logo、色彩体系、字体、UI 规范、插画风格定义，确保最终视觉在各渠道（App、社媒、落地页、IP 形象）一致。
    
4.  **负责应用内虚拟形象与氛围设计**  
    包含：虚拟陪伴角色的视觉设定、氛围插画、星盘/塔罗/命盘可视化组件、AI 生成图形的风格控制。
    
5.  **输出高质量视觉稿并推动落地**  
    提供设计稿、动效稿、交互说明，推动最终效果还原度，并持续优化体验。
    
6.  **参与用户研究与数据分析**  
    基于用户数据、A/B、留存点，优化 UI 信息结构与视觉策略。
    

* * *

**任职要求**
--------

1.  **3年以上 UI / 视觉 / 品牌设计经验**，移动端重度经验优先。
    
2.  **审美能力强，掌握情绪化设计、IP 角色风格设计、插画风格统一**等能力。
    
3.  熟练使用 **Figma / PS / AI / AE / Blender（加分）**。
    
4.  具备跨团队协作能力，能推动功能从概念到上线。
    
5.  **对玄学、占星、人格心理、虚拟人、二次元、AI 应用** 任一方向感兴趣或有经验者优先。
    
6.  有 **AI 生成式工具经验（Midjourney/SD/Runway）** 为强加分项。
    
7.  对“氛围感、沉浸体验、故事性设计”敏感，能独立掌控风格。
    

* * *

**加分项**
-------

*   做过虚拟人、IP、角色、Vtuber、数字分身相关设计
    
*   有命理/塔罗/星盘等产品 UI 经验
    
*   会简单 3D，能制作小动效
    
*   曾参与 0→1 项目、审美稳定，有完整作品集
    

* * *

**我们提供**
--------

*   参与从 0 到 1 的前沿产品：AI + 命理 + 虚拟陪伴
    
*   可深度参与 AI 人格、IP 世界观、AI 生成设计体系探索
    
*   快速迭代、小团队、发挥空间大
jobCategory: UI&UX,设计,AI,内容创作,产品经理

postTitle: SmartDeer 招聘兼职产品经理（北京，支持远程）
descContent:
我们正在寻找一位业务理解扎实、责任心强的产品经理，加入 SmartDeer 业财系统团队。  
你将负责 SmartDeer 自研业财系统的核心产品模块，从需求到上线全流程推动落地。  
官网： [https://smartdeer.com￼](https://smartdeer.com)  
  
⸻  
  
📌 岗位职责（ Role & Objectives ）  
1\. 负责内部业财系统相关产品的需求调研、可行性分析与方案设计，深入理解财务与业务流程。  
2\. 参与公司业务与产品战略讨论，将目标拆解为清晰的产品规划、需求文档与功能原型。  
3\. 负责财务相关产品的原型设计与 PRD 编写，确保业务逻辑、规则、流程定义清晰、可实现、可迭代。  
4\. 协同研发、测试、项目等团队，推进产品按计划交付并对交付质量负责。  
5\. 持续关注用户反馈与数据表现，对现有功能进行优化与迭代，提升用户体验和业务效率。  
  
⸻  
  
🎯 任职要求（ Qualifications ）  
1\. 本科及以上学历，3 年及以上产品工作经验（有业财一体化 / 财务系统经验者优先）。  
2\. 理解财务类产品的核心业务逻辑，熟悉账单、订单、费用、审批、结算等模块者优先。  
3\. 沟通表达能力强，能准确洞察用户需求和业务痛点，具备良好的跨部门协作能力。  
4\. 具备较强的学习能力和独立分析能力，能够在复杂业务场景中建立结构化认知。  
5\. 熟练使用 Axure / Xmind / Visio / Office 等主流产品工具。  
6\. 逻辑严谨、结构化思维强，对细节敏感，具备良好的业务抽象能力与系统化思考能力。  
  
⸻  
  
🗓 工作安排  
• 职位类型：兼职  
• 合作形式：远程为主，base 北京 的优先。  
• 在线时间：每日 10:00–19:00 保持可沟通状态  
• 项目节奏相对紧凑，需要较强的自我管理能力与结果导向意识  
  
⸻  
  
📍 工作地点  
• 北京市  
• 支持远程办公


面试方式：飞书视频会议。
薪资范围由负责该岗位的同事评估候选人情况后确认，目前我这边没有最终预算信息，所以不方便代为给出数字。  
  
建议有兴趣的同学可以直接投递或私信简历，我们会按照匹配度及时沟通具体待遇。

postTitle: 在阿里云上部署服务器，识别集装箱箱照片及物流表单，配置API
jobTitle: 在阿里云上部署服务器，识别集装箱箱照片及物流表单，配置API
descContent:
我们有一个项目要求如下：
1、识别上传的集装箱照片，读出箱主、箱型、箱号、总重、载重、自重、容积，如果照片有挂车车牌，需同时识别车牌号，API以JSON返回以上信息。
2、上传报关单、装箱单、海运提单、订舱单、合同（订单）、空运运单、托运单等贸易单据，上传文件可以为PDF、Word、Excel、图片格式，返回贸易文件中的各项信息如发收货人、货物明细、申报要素等等，返回JSON格式，未识别的项目值为空。
3、可直接采用阿里开源模型  Qwen-VL-Chat API 配置部署，阿里云服务器由甲方租用提供。
4、私有化部署，模型只能接受指定内网访问。
5、其他要求：
     API 接口 ：RESTful，支持 `multipart/form-data` 图片上传
     响应格式 ：统一 JSON，含状态码、消息、结果数据
     性能要求 ：
        单图处理时间 ≤ 3 秒（在 NVIDIA T4 或同级 GPU 上）
        支持并发 ≥ 5 请求
        可维护性：提供 Docker 镜像或清晰部署脚本。
6、指导甲方人员完成整个服务器的配置过程，经调试测试通过。

postTitle: [招聘] 区块链工程师、策略开发工程师（远程全职）
jobTitle: 区块链工程师、策略开发工程师
descContent:
公司简介：[FrontierFund.io](http://FrontierFund.io)
专注于通过量化策略和风控系统为加密货币市场提供专业投资和流动性解决方案。我们管理超过 2 亿美元资产，日交易量超 3
亿美元，提供加密资产流动性研究和策略服务。我们致力于打造开放协作的工作环境，欢迎富有激情的人才加入！  
投递邮箱: [hr@frontierfund.io](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection)  
邮件标题格式: 岗位 + 城市 + 姓名 + 工作年限  
欢迎大家发送邮件投递简历！  
  
**区块链工程师**  
**岗位职责**  
* 负责以太坊/Solana 等智能合约开发、部署、迭代、安全；  
* 与需求人员充分沟通，负责链上策略的研究、编写、运行。  
  
**岗位要求**  
1\. 3 年以上前端(React/Next.js)、后端、数据库(MySQL/PostgreSQL)经验；  
2\. 2~3 年 Solidity/Rust/Move 智能合约开发经验；  
3\. 熟悉并掌握 Ethereum/Solana/Aptos 等公链，并理解常见协议；  
4\. 熟悉 Web3 工具(web3.js/ethers.js/Hardhat/Foundry/Anchor 等)；  
5\. 熟悉 gas 优化技术及其权衡；  
6\. 具有部署到公共测试网/主网的经验，并能管理合约地址、验证和 ABI ；  
7\. 熟练使用 Git 、代码审查和协作工作流程。  
* 岗位月薪：15K~25k  
  
**策略开发工程师**  
**岗位职责**  
* 负责量化策略代码编写、部署、运维、迭代；  
* 与需求人员保持良好沟通，充分理解策略需求；  
* 不断提升策略代码执行效率、优化策略实现逻辑。  
  
**岗位要求**  
1\. 3 年以上开发经验，精通以下至少两种编程语言：Python/Rust/Java/Golang ；  
2\. 熟悉掌握 Linux 、MySQL 或 PostgreSQL 数据库、Redis 缓存、消息队列、容器等基础组件；  
3\. 精通并发编程和异步编程，能够处理高并发场景下的技术挑战；  
4\. 熟悉各大 CEX/DEX 的 RESTful API 和 WebSocket 等接口对接，有丰富的集成经验；  
5\. 熟悉数据分析和处理，能够进行指标计算、统计分析等数据相关开发工作；  
6\. 具备良好的沟通、学习和表达能力，善于使用 AI 提升效率，能够编写高质量的文档和代码；  
7\. 有分布式系统开发经验者优先，熟悉微服务架构者优先。  
* 岗位月薪：15K~25k  
  
**薪酬与待遇**  
* 全职远程 & 8 小时工作制  
* 周末双休 & 法定节假日  
* MacBook Pro  
* Claude Code Max  
* WLB 的工作节奏
jobCategory: 区块链,后端开发,算法,金融,DevOps/MLOps

postTitle: 双机跨网全屏幕画中画共享脚本需求
jobTitle: 双机跨网全屏幕画中画共享脚本需求
descContent:
1. 核心功能：两台手机（A机、B机）跨网络双向互通（无需蓝牙/同Wi-Fi，支持4G/5G/不同网络），无距离限制；

2. 画面传输规则：A机实时共享整机全屏幕画面，无延迟显示在B机画中画窗口；B机同步共享整机全屏幕画面，无延迟显示在A机画中画窗口，实现双向无延迟互看；

3. 交互权限：仅支持观看，无远程控制权限；

4. 画中画特性：悬浮窗口可手动拖拽调整位置、缩放大小，附加一键隐藏画中画。

postTitle: 加拿大招聘高级Java/技术总监/架构师 - 15-18万加币/年
descContent:
**公司介绍：**  
公司成立于 2022 年，服务覆盖 超过 130 个国家和地区，日交易量在约 15 亿美元以上，最近完成B 轮融资约 1,000 万美元，估值约 2 亿美元  
.

**工作职责：**  
1、 全面负责技术团队组建、梯队建设及公司技术层面的所有管理工作。  
2、结合公司业务发展需求和系统现状，制定技术发展战略，对系统架构发展进行规划、组织制定和实施重大技术决策和方案。  
3、负责产品从需求到交付全程的技术方案设计、开发流程、质量和开发进度的规划、控制、监督和管理，确保公司产品的研发进度，并在完成后进行质量评估。  
4、平台系统的日常运维、风险审核、风险检查及风险预警提示和解决方案等有关工作，并对系统安全性、稳定性负责。  
.  
**任职要求：**  
1、统招本科及以上学历，计算机、软件类相关专业，有架构设计经验，精通java C等主流系统开发语言一种或多种。  
2、区块链相关技术研发经验（有衍生品、链上开发经验）有带团队管理经验优先；  
3、熟悉主流区块链开源项目的实现机制及运行原理优先。  
4、熟悉各种数据结构和算法者优先。  
5、熟悉交易系统架构与机制者优先。  
6、具有较强的学习、沟通、表达及团队管理能力。  
7、主要是Java后端经验丰富，要有一定的人员管理和项目管理经验。
。
公司在温哥华温西Marine Drive，全加都可以申请，温哥华混合办公，其他地区远程办公，但必须人在北美，有加拿大/美国合法工作身份
。
金融/区块链行业不是必须项是加分项，有高并发经验也可以，英语不做要求，团队基本都是华人，中文流利即可。
jobCategory: 后端开发,项目管理,区块链,金融,运维

postTitle: 新媒体运营兼职（小红书）
jobTitle: 新媒体运营兼职（小红书）
descContent:
工作周期：长期兼职  
每周工期：5天及以上  
工作时间：不限  
工作时段：不限  
结算方式：周结  
招聘截止时间：2026-01-24  
一、岗位名称​  
小红书图文内容创作兼职（免费提供线上简单培训，约半小时）  
​二、工作模式​  
远程办公，时间自由，按时交付成果即可。  
​三、主要工作内容​  
每天工作大约一小时——两小时左右（根据工作熟练程度）  
​选题策划：​​ 根据我们提供的产品/品牌方向，挖掘小红书热点，策划有吸引力的图文选题。  
​文案撰写：​​ 撰写符合小红书平台调性的文案，包括吸引眼球的标题、干货满满的正文以及相关话题标签。  
​图片设计：​​ 使用【醒图、Canva、美图秀秀】等工具，设计制作风格统一、美观吸睛的封面图和内页图。  
​内容发布：​​ 在指定时间发布笔记，并进行初步的互动维护（如回复前期评论）。  
​四、我们希望你​  
是小红书的深度用户，对平台热点、流行语、社区氛围有敏锐的感知力。  
有良好的网感和审美能力。  
具备一定的的文案功底，行文流畅，有共情力，能写出“利他”或“种草”型内容。  
有责任心，注重细节，能按时高质量完成工作任务。  
​五、薪资福利​  
按照能够完成的账号图文数量支付，具体请咨询我）  
​灵活的协作方式：​​ 完全线上沟通，不坐班，充分尊重你的个人时间。  
​稳定的合作机会：​​ 长期合作，表现优异者可获得涨薪机会。  
​创意自由发挥：​​ 我们鼓励创意，在核心方向下给予你充分的创作空间。
jobCategory: 内容创作,运营,市场营销

3、负责产品从需求到交付全程的技术方案设计、开发流程、质量和开发进度的规划、控制、监督和管理，确保公司产品的研发进度，并在完成后进行质量评估。
4、平台系统的日常运维、风险审核、风险检查及风险预警提示和解决方案等有关工作，并对系统安全性、稳定性负责。
 
任职要求： 
1、统招本科及以上学历，计算机、软件类相关专业，有架构设计经验，精通go、java、C++等主流区块链系统开发语言一种或多种。
2、五年以上区块链相关技术研发经验，三年以上研发团队管理经验，管理技术团队不少于20人。 
3、熟悉区块链底层技术原理，熟悉P2P网络和分布式存储，熟悉主流的共识机制。
4、熟悉ipfs, filecoin, ethereum、openchain、bitcoin、hyperledger等主流区块链开源项目的实现机制及运行原理。
 5、熟悉各种数据结构和算法，对分布式计算、安全协议、加密算法和云计算有所研究。
6、对交易系统有深入理解，对交易系统架构与机制有独特见解。
7、具有较强的学习、沟通、表达及团队管理能力。
8、阅读过底层源码并做过相关修改者，或参与过区块链交易系统开发并贡献源码者优先。

备注：前期远程，后期必须base加拿大，需要有中心化交易所系统架构和业务精通
薪资：5500-8000U
jobCategory: 后端开发,区块链,金融,项目管理,运维

EDUopinions is a leading platform focused on verified student reviews. Our
mission is to connect students and provide valuable reviews that are easily
