postTitle: Social Media Manager - 0x/Matcha at 0x
descContent:
**COMPANY**

At [0x](https://0x.org/), our mission is to "Create a Tokenized World Where
All Forms of Value Can Flow Freely". We deliver this to web3 builders with a
delightfully simple suite of developer APIs that provide faster trading,
better prices, and superior user experience.

Founded in 2017, we’ve processed over 78M+ transactions and $140B+ in trading
volume from users trading on Matcha, Coinbase Wallet, Robinhood Wallet,
Phantom, Rainbow, DefiLlama, MetaMask, Zerion, Zapper, and many more. Our
investors include Greylock Partners, Pantera Capital, and Jump Crypto.

When you join 0x, you’ll become part of a veteran team of crypto builders who
know the importance of code quality, team cohesion, and a culture of learning.

### **The Role**

We’re looking for a **Senior Social Media Manager** to own the strategy,
execution, and performance of social media across our core brands: **0x** ,
**Matcha**. You’ll join a high-ownership, multi-skilled marketing team and
play a critical role in growing awareness, building trust, driving customer
and user engagement into our funnels through high-quality content and
platform-native storytelling.

This role is embedded within our central creative function and works closely
with product marketing, content, design, product, sales and leadership. You’ll
report into the Creative Hub Lead and collaborate cross-functionally to ensure
our social presence supports our growth goals and helps position us at the
forefront of crypto innovation.

### **What You’ll Do**

  * Manage and operate social channels across multiple brands (e.g. 0x, Matcha and other product expansions)

  * Define and evolve our social strategy: what platforms to invest in, which to exit, and how we scale high-performing content

  * Translate product launches, ecosystem milestones, partnerships, and longer-form content (case studies, articles, research) into compelling, snackable content that fits each platform

  * Work across ~8-10 social channels, including:

    * 0x: X, LinkedIn, Farcaster, YouTube, Discord

    * Matcha: X, Farcaster, YouTube, and potentially TikTok & Instagram later

  * Build repeatable content systems, series, and playbooks for scalable execution

  * Own reporting and performance analysis, with a focus on both channel-level growth and downstream impact on web traffic to [0x.org](http://0x.org) and [matcha.xyz](http://matcha.xyz)

  * Stay deeply plugged into crypto-native social culture and trends — create hype, insert our brand into the narrative and bring market feedback and insights back into the team

  * Help assess when to bring in external resources (e.g. contractor support, designers, video editors) and manage them if needed

### **You May Be a Fit If You…**

  * Have **4+ years of experience** managing social media for high-growth brands

  * Have run **multiple social accounts** at once, either in-house or within an agency or creative hub (e.g. Hype Partners, Serotonin, or similar)

  * **Deep into web3.** Professional experience in web3 is preferred, but if you work in web2 and is deep in Crypto Twitter on the side, you could be great a fit.

  * Bring a strong **creative eye** — you know how to craft content that resonates, generates hype, and drives engagement

  * Are highly fluent in **content repurposing** — you can turn one case study into 10+ social assets across multiple formats and platforms

  * **Are resourceful and utilizes AI, apps and other external tools** to create content or to kick start briefs

  * Know how to scale content production through systems and structure without killing creativity

  * Understand the tactical side of growth — being the reply guy, how to use hashtags, engage with posts, optimize formats, and test ideas

  * Stay current on platform changes, community culture, and new formats — and you love experimenting with them

  * Are comfortable working asynchronously across multiple stakeholders and shifting priorities in a fast-moving environment

### **Nice to Have**

  * Experience in the crypto/web3 space or deep curiosity and readiness to dive in. If you work in web2 and is deep in Crypto Twitter on the side, we encourage you to apply.

  * Familiarity with analytics tools (e.g. Sprout, Shield, native platform insights)

  * Light design chops or familiarity with briefing creative collaborators

### **What We’ll Offer You**

  * Competitive salary and equity. Base salary, equity and tokens

  * Remote-first culture with flexible hours and location

  * Company benefits and perks (You’ll get more details during the process. Most of our employees find our benefits one of the most generous in the market)

  * Annual team retreats (2x a year, you are expected to travel to attend them)

  * An open, inclusive, and collaborative team environment

  * The opportunity to have a long-lasting impact in two well-known, reputable brands in web3

### **Benefits**

  * The base salary range for this position is USD $120,000 - $160,000 + equity + ZRX tokens + benefits. Within the range, individual pay is determined by job-related skills, experience, location, business needs, and candidate preferences between the different compensation elements.

  * Comprehensive insurance (medical/dental/vision/life/disability) for U.S.-based employees — 100% of base plan covered for you and dependents

  * 401k and FSA for U.S.-based employees

  * Monthly mobile phone bill, wellness, and pre-tax transportation expense

  * Covered mental health benefits (included professional therapy sessions)

  * A supportive remote environment

  * Lunch reimbursement for all employees across the globe!

  * Stipend for your ideal remote / WFH set-up: headphones, and any other work gear you may need

  * 12-week paid parental leave

  * Great office conveniently located in the SF Financial District for those in the region!

  * Flexible vacation: Take time when you need it (and we really mean it!)

0x and its associated entities are dedicated to fostering diversity,
inclusion, and belonging in its teams and workforce, and are proud to be equal
opportunity employers. 0x does not make employment or hiring decisions on the
basis of race, color, creed, religion, sex (including those who are pregnant
or have given birth), sexual orientation, gender, gender expression or
identity, age, disability, medical condition, genetic information, military or
veteran status, marital status, pregnancy, citizenship, national origin,
immigration or citizenship status, political affiliation, or any other basis
that is protected by applicable local, state, or federal laws. This includes
not making such decisions based on the status itself, as well as any
associations, perceptions, and assumptions made regarding these statuses. 0x
will also consider qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records in
a way that is consistent with San Francisco’s Fair Chance Ordinance and
similar local laws. Our commitment to equal employment opportunity extends to
ensuring that all applicants and employees can perform to their fullest
potential, including through obtaining reasonable accommodations when
necessary.

postTitle: Golang 开发工程师（Web3 / 钱包方向 / 交易方向）
jobTitle: Golang 开发工程师（Web3 / 钱包方向 / 交易方向）
descContent:
# 🚀 职位名称

**Golang 开发工程师（ Web3 / 钱包方向 / 交易方向）**  
📍 地点：远程 💼 类型：全职/兼职

* * *

## 🧭 关于我们

**Hypersolid** 是一个快速成长的 Web3 原生交易与钱包生态产品，基于 **Hyperliquid 流动性** 构建。  
我们正在打造下一代加密原生的 **DEX + Wallet 一体化体验** ，让交易与资产管理真正做到无缝、流畅、可自定义。

你将与一支由产品、设计与工程深度协作的团队共同打造核心 App ，从零到一塑造全新的交易体验标准。

* * *

## 💡 岗位职责

  1. 参与项目需求评审并将**业务需求转化为开发需求** ，制定开发方案并实现； 
  2. 负责产品开发中编码与单元测试、缺陷修复； 
  3. 根据需要，参与**调研第三方平台服务** 的接入，并梳理可行性方案； 
  4. **服务稳定性巡检** ，定期查看监控大盘，针对性能瓶颈点能提出一些想法和优化点； 

* * *

## 🧠 岗位要求

  1. 精通 Golang 开发，至少具备三年 golang 开发经验；
  2. 有扎实的区块链基础知识，熟悉链上一些基础知识（ BTC 、ETH 的用户模型、共识机制等）以及交易所相关知识（现货、合约仓位、订单薄等）； 
  3. 深入理解常用的中间件 **Kafka** 、**Redis** 等；
  4. 具备良好的业务需求分析能力及代码规范意识，能有逻辑地易于维护地实现业务需求；
  5. **熟悉 K8S** ，能简单使用 **kubectl** 命令进行服务管理及问题排障；
  6. 需要具备一定自驱力，具有良好沟通、团队协作能力，能以事为主，确保排期的任务能及时交付。 

* * *

## 🪩 加分项（ Nice-to-Have ）

  * 有 **Web3 / 钱包 / 交易类产品** 开发经验； 
  * 了解区块链交互（如 **WalletConnect 、签名、资产展示** 等）； 
  * 有 **App 上架 / CI/CD** 实战经验； 
  * 有 **开源项目或高质量 GitHub 作品** 。 

* * *

## 🧭 我们提供

  * 扁平化团队，工程主导文化； 
  * 灵活工作制，远程为主； 
  * 有竞争力的薪酬 + **Token 激励** ； 
  * 参与核心产品决策与架构设计； 
  * 你写的代码将被全球用户直接使用。 

* * *

postTitle: 【30k 全栈工程师】相机类app 远程立即启动，确保时间充足
descContent:
岗位职责（仅技术栈）

1. iOS 原生开发：Swift / SwiftUI（或 UIKit），模块化架构（MVVM / TCA / Clean 任一）
2. 相机与媒体链路：AVFoundation（实时预览、拍照、视频帧处理、权限、相册写入 PhotoKit）
3. UI/动效：SwiftUI 动画 / Core Animation；玻璃拟态/模糊：UIVisualEffectView / SwiftUI Material；必要时 Metal/CIImage 管线优化
4. 端侧视觉识别：Vision + Core ML（人物/人脸/姿态、场景标签、布局/分割可选）；模型部署与更新策略（on-device & remote config）
5. 图像/几何辅助：ARKit（可选）（平面/深度/光照估计、锚点叠加）；或纯 2D overlay 坐标系统
6. 后端服务（全栈）：Node.js（NestJS/Express）或 Python（FastAPI），API 设计（OpenAPI），缓存（Redis），数据库（Postgres）
7. LLM 集成：结构化输出（JSON Schema）、内容缓存、成本/延迟控制；流式返回
8. 部署与运维：Docker、CI/CD（GitHub Actions）、AWS 云部署
9. 账户与支付：Sign in with Apple；StoreKit 2（IAP / 消耗型按次包）
    
任职要求
1. 扎实的 Swift 能力；熟悉 AVFoundation 与多线程/性能优化（帧率、内存、耗电）
2. 熟悉 Vision/Core ML 落地经验（推理、量化、设备适配、模型加载）
3. 具备后端研发与上线能力（Node/Python 任一），能独立交付 API + 数据层 + 部署

postTitle: 全球旅游定制师
descContent:
工作周期：长期兼职  
每周工期：5天及以上  
工作时间：不限  
工作时段：不限  
结算方式：完工结  
招聘截止时间：2030-12-31  
一、岗位定位  
线上旅行定制师是旅行服务链路的执行主体，承担需求确认、方案制定、订单实施、行中支持及客户维护等核心流程。岗位采用远程办公形式，无需线下坐班。从业者需严格遵循流程规范，确保每一环节标准化执行。  
二、流程化工作职责  
（一）需求受理流程  
1\. 在接到公司系统分配的客户后，需在规定时效内完成首次响应；  
2\. 使用标准化沟通脚本确认客户基础信息，包括预算、人数、时间、目的地及特殊需求；  
3\. 建立客户档案，录入系统，并标注客户需求类型、优先级与复杂度；  
4\. 判断需求可行性，如遇政策性限制、资源不足等情况需按流程上报操作组。  
（二）方案制定流程  
1\. 根据客户档案信息启动方案设计，按照时间顺序规划每日动线；  
2\. 使用公司内部系统调取机票、酒店、用车、门票等项目价格与库存；  
3\. 输出方案初稿后进行自检，包括路线是否过于紧凑、酒店位置是否合理、预算结构是否合理；  
4\. 将方案以标准格式发送客户，并进行首次讲解；  
5\. 若客户提出修改意见，需按照“反馈—调整—确认”流程进行优化。  
（三）订单执行流程  
1\. 客户确认方案后，立即发起订单指令，确保航班、酒店等资源锁定；  
2\. 对接酒店供应商、地接社及用车团队，确认项目可执行性；  
3\. 按照公司审核流程提交订单，确保合同信息、客户资料、价格明细等一致；  
4\. 制作行前确认单，包括出发时间、联系人、酒店地址、注意事项等；  
5\. 提供客户行前沟通服务，协助完成证件及材料准备。  
（四）行中服务流程  
1\. 客户出行期间需保持通讯畅通，在约定时段值守；  
2\. 如遇航班延误、服务变动等突发情况，需按流程进行紧急处置：判断问题性质—与合作方沟通—提出解决方案—向客户说明；  
3\. 对客户临时提出的调整需求进行可行性判断，并按流程处理；  
4\. 记录所有异常情况，便于后续分析。  
（五）行后反馈与维护流程  
1\. 客户回国后 24 小时内发起回访，了解真实体验；  
2\. 将反馈内容录入系统，包括满意度评价、可改善点及后续需求；  
3\. 对高潜力客户建立复购标签，并定期进行服务触达；  
4\. 对典型问题提交至流程优化小组，用于持续提升服务质量。  
三、任职要求  
1\. 大专及以上学历，熟悉电脑操作与基本办公软件；  
2\. 执行力强，能够严格按照流程开展工作；  
3\. 沟通能力良好，能够在高压状态下保持专业态度；  
4\. 学习能力强，需通过公司 9 天免费培训并完成考核；  
5\. 工作态度严谨，具有强烈的责任感与时间节点意识。  
四、薪酬与考核机制  
1\. 薪资结构为：基本工资 + 提成，总收入 3000 元至无上限；  
2\. 所有收入按“完工结”于每月 10 日统一发放；  
3\. 绩效考核基于流程执行准确度、客户满意度、订单转化率等指标；  
4\. 无任何押金或收费，岗位完全零成本加入。  
五、岗位优势  
1\. 地点不限，可远程办公；  
2\. 时间自主性高，可自行安排工作节奏；  
3\. 晋升路径清晰：定制师 → 组长 → 区域总监；  
4\. 配套流程体系成熟，适合长期发展。

postTitle: <外包>寻一名IOS开发，5年经验以上，要熟手
descContent:
要求：
  
1.  **本科及以上学历**，计算机或相关专业优先。
    
2.  **5 年以上 iOS 开发经验**，至少完整负责过 2 个以上上线 App（最好是订阅制产品）。
    
3.  熟练掌握 **Swift + Objective-C**，了解混编、桥接文件、内存管理及生命周期。
    
4.  精通 **MVVM / MVC / VIPER** 至少一种架构模式，并能根据产品规模进行合理拆分与重构。
    
5.  熟练掌握苹果官方的 **StoreKit / StoreKit2 / In-App Purchase** API，深刻理解：
    
    *   订阅模型（周订 / 月订 / 年订）
        
    *   促销优惠（Offer Codes、Refund、Grace Period）
        
    *   客户端与服务端收据验证
        
    *   沙盒与生产环境差异
        
    *   区域价格差与汇率策略
        
    
6.  有成熟的 **多语言开发经验**：文本本地化、动态语言切换、国际化资源管理、RTL 适配。
    
7.  UI 感知强，能够做到 **高保真设计还原**：字体、间距、色彩、圆角、动效还原度 ≥ 95%。
    
8.  深刻理解 **UIKit / AutoLayout / SwiftUI（其中一种或两种并用）**，熟练处理复杂界面适配。
    
9.  熟练使用 **GCD、OperationQueue** 实现异步任务调度和线程安全处理。
    
10.  熟悉常用第三方库（Alamofire、Kingfisher、SnapKit）及 CocoaPods / SPM 依赖管理。
    
11.  对 **应用性能、Crash、内存泄漏、卡顿、启动优化**有成熟经验（如 Instruments、Xcode Debug Tools）。
    
12.  有完整的 **App Store 提审、合规、隐私权限合规**经验，理解 4.3、5.1.1、2.1 等常见审核规则。
    

**加分项**
1.有出海APP开发经验
2.自驱性强
3.最好在二线城市(西安最好)，业余时间多
外包待遇：
    我们有长期的 iOS外包开发需求，项目稳定、节奏明确，合作方式如下：

*   **按功能包计价**，每包价格 **1 万出头**（视工作量微调），最好3周出一个包。
    
*   不需要对接服务端、不接入第三方 SDK，**只需实现前端功能与页面**，任务纯净简单。
    
*   可使用 **AI 辅助开发**（我们完全认可，也鼓励高效）。
    
*   付款方式：**30% 首付 → 功能完成付 50% → 最终验收付 20%**，流程透明。
    
*   我们会持续发包，**预计总共 10+ 个包**，合作稳定、量大。
    
    欢迎对价格与方式认可的开发者来加我，电量我报销。长期合作。

postTitle: 寻找 Python 爬虫工程师 - 兼职/远程合作
jobTitle: Python 爬虫工程师（高级/架构师）
descContent:
# 🚀 寻找 Python 爬虫工程师 - 兼职/远程合作

你好！我是一名独立开发者，正在开发一个**大规模舆情监控与分析系统** 。这是一个技术挑战性很高的项目，涉及爬虫、AI 、RPA 等多个领域。

由于项目规模较大，所以想找一些**技术能力强、有经验** 的伙伴一起合作。

**合作方式** ：兼职/远程，时间灵活，按项目/任务结算

* * *

## 🔍 需要的人才

### 岗位：Python 爬虫工程师（高级/架构师）🔥 急招

#### 技术要求

**必须技能** ：

  * ✅ **3-5 年以上爬虫开发经验**
  * ✅ **有大规模爬虫项目经验**
  * ✅ **精通 JS 逆向** ：能破解 JS 加密、JSVMP 、参数加密
  * ✅ **精通浏览器自动化** ：Playwright 、Selenium ，能模拟真实用户行为
  * ✅ **精通反爬虫对抗** ：处理 IP 封禁、账号封禁、验证码、设备指纹检测
  * ✅ **精通分布式爬虫** ：Scrapy-Redis 、Celery ，能设计分布式架构
  * ✅ **有成本优化经验** ：降低代理 IP 成本、账号成本

**加分项** ：

  * 有舆情监控项目经验
  * 有开源项目贡献
  * 有技术博客、技术分享

#### 薪资待遇

  * **兼职** ：按项目/任务结算，具体面议
  * **远程** ：完全远程，时间灵活
  * **长期合作** ：如果合作愉快，可以长期合作

* * *

## 📝 如何申请

### 申请方式

  1. **邮箱** ：发送邮件到 anchorvr@gmail.com ，标题格式：`[岗位名称] - [你的名字]`

### 申请材料

请提供以下材料：

  1. **技术简历** ：重点突出相关项目经验
  2. **技术作品** ：
     * GitHub 主页（如果有开源项目更好）
     * 技术博客（如果有技术分享更好）
     * 项目案例（可以匿名，但要有技术细节）
  3. **自我介绍** ：
     * 技术背景
     * 项目经验
     * 为什么想合作
  4. **期望薪资** ：兼职期望薪资（按项目或按小时）

### 面试流程

  1. **初步筛选** ：根据简历和技术作品筛选
  2. **技术面试** ：技术能力评估
  3. **合作洽谈** ：如果通过，洽谈合作方式和薪资

* * *

## 🎯 我们最看重什么

### 技术能力（最重要）

  * **实战经验** ：有真实项目经验，不是只会理论
  * **问题解决能力** ：遇到问题能快速找到解决方案
  * **技术深度** ：对技术有深入理解，不是浅尝辄止

### 项目经验

  * **大规模项目经验** ：有处理大规模数据的经验
  * **复杂问题处理** ：有处理复杂技术问题的经验
  * **成本优化经验** ：有优化成本的经验

### 性格特质

  * **能独立解决问题** ：不需要手把手教
  * **有责任心** ：按时完成项目任务
  * **能团队协作** ：能与其他成员配合
  * **学习能力强** ：技术更新快，需要不断学习

jobTitle: 谷歌 SEO 优化师 (内容创作向)
descContent:
Position 一：谷歌 SEO 优化师 (内容创作向)  
Job Type：Full-Time, Remote  
Salary：$4000-$8000 / month +季度奖金  
PS：  
1 、SEO 经验：至少 3 年以上 Web3 或 Crypto 行业的谷歌 SEO 经验，熟悉 DeFi
相关核心概念，了解搜索引擎的排名机制和索引机制，具备数据验证的 SEO 增长经验。  
2 、DeFi 行业理解：洞察 DeFi 行业趋势，能够结合谷歌搜索引擎算法及海外 SEO 策略，制定有效的关键词、内容和链接策略。  
3 、SEO 工具与技术：熟练使用各种 SEO 工具和技术，具备 AI 内容生成技术应用经验，能够结合 AI 优化内容创作，提高 SEO 效率和质量。  
4 、文案能力与媒体投放资源：具备一定的文案能力，有币圈海外媒体投放渠道和资源，能够执行内容营销策略。  
5.加分项：  
（ 1 ）海外社媒（ Facebook 、Twitter 、Reddit 等）投放经验，尤其是涉及 DeFi 或 Web3 产品的内容营销经验。  
（ 2 ）有在去中心化交易所、流动性协议或 DeFi 产品的 SEO 优化经验。  
  
Position 二：谷歌 SEO 优化师 （技术）  
Job Type：Full-Time, Remote  
Salary：$4000-$8000 / month +季度奖金  
PS：  
1 、至少 3 年以上 Web3 或 Crypto 行业谷歌 SEO 经验，具备中心化交易所 SEO
实操经验，深刻理解搜索引擎排名机制、索引逻辑及核心指标（如 DA/PA 、CTR 、转化率），拥有经数据验证的 SEO 增长案例与方法论。  
2 、精通谷歌算法（如 Penguin 、Panda ）及海外 SEO 策略，能独立制定关键词策略、内容矩阵（如交易教程、行业解析）及外链建设方案，且熟悉
CEX 在合规性内容、用户教育内容上的 SEO 玩法。  
3 、熟练掌握 SEO 工具栈：包括但不限于 Ahrefs 、Semrush 、Google Search Console 、Google
Analytics 、Surfer SEO 等，能通过工具输出精准的数据分析与优化建议。  
4 、拥有币圈海外媒体资源（如行业网站、KOL 渠道）及外链投放经验，具备基础英文文案能力，能独立撰写或指导团队产出符合 SEO
逻辑的加密行业内容（如交易指南、平台功能解析）。  
5 、数据分析能力突出：能从流量、排名、转化数据中定位问题与增长点，形成可落地的优化方案（如页面结构调整、关键词密度优化），并推动跨团队执行。  
6 、对 Web3 行业热点（如 Layer2 升级、新公链生态、监管政策）敏感度高，能快速将热点转化为 SEO
内容选题，驱动流量增长；具备强责任心与迭代思维，能在快速变化的市场中主动探索新策略。  
加分项：同时拥有 Facebook 、Twitter （ X ）等海外社媒投放经验，能实现 SEO 与社媒流量的协同增长。  
  
Position 三：后台开发（ Web3 交易系统方向）  
Job Type：Full-Time, Remote  
Salary：6000 - 12000U / month+季度奖⾦  
PS：  
1 、计算机科学、软件⼯程或相关专业本科及以上学历。  
2 、5 年以上后端开发经验，具备至少 1/5 年中心化交易所技术背景。  
3 、对交易所技术栈有深入理解，包括订单撮合引擎、低延迟通信、金融级一致性方案。  
4 、有大型分布式高并发系统的研发经验，熟悉高可用、容灾、限流降级等稳定性保障手段。  
5 、具备较强的问题解决能力和目标导向的思维方式，有较强的抗压能力  
  
Position 四：Java 后台开发（精通 Java ）  
Job Type：Full-Time, Remote  
Salary：6000 - 12000U / month+季度奖⾦  
PS：  
1 、计算机科学、软件⼯程或相关专业本科及以上学历。五年以上后端开发经验，具备知名交易所（ CEX/DEX ）开发经验。  
2 、Java 基础扎实，深刻理解 JVM 的配置优化策略、调优，熟悉 IO
、多线程并发框架，熟悉常见的数据结构、算法与设计模式，具有良好的编程规范和丰富的工作经验。  
3 、熟悉主流开源应用框架，如 SpringBoot 、SpringCloud 等。  
4 、熟练掌握分布式系统设计与开发，具备高并发、大规模系统的开发与优化经验。  
5 、熟悉数据库设计与优化，对事务、锁、索引深入理解，并有 SQL 优化经验以及分库分表、主从同步等设计方法。  
6 、熟悉常用中间件，如 MQ 、RPC 、缓存等，熟悉后端安全措施，能够处理 DDoS 、SQL 注入等攻击风险。  
加分项：  
\- 有 RocketMQ 、Kafka 等主流消息队列深度使⽤或调优经验。  
\- 熟悉 Kubernetes (k8s) 容器编排技术，有实际的容器化应⽤部署和运维经验。  
\- 对 RocketMQ 、Kafka 等消息中间件有源码级别理解。  
\- 对系统安全、攻防有深⼊理解和实践经验。  
\- 活跃的开源社区贡献者，或有相关的技术博客和分享。  
  
Position 五：资深后端开发-链上  
Job Type：Full-Time, Remote  
Salary：$6000 - $12000 / month+季度奖⾦  
PS：  
1-负责去中心化衍生品交易平台的链上开发与维护，参与 Blockchain 相关核心功能的架构设计与技术实现。  
2-优化链上交互性能，确保智能合约能够高效、准确地进行调用和交互。  
3-⾄少 3/5 年以上 Blockchain 开发经验，精通 Solidity ，熟悉 Hardhat/Foundry 等合约开发与测试框架，熟悉
OpenZeppelin 库。  
4-有 DeFi 项目开发经验，了解衍生品交易机制；理解智能合约漏洞类型，了解 Blockchain 安全和审计最佳实践。  
5-良好的英语读写能力，能够⽆障碍阅读英⽂技术⽂献和进⾏技术交流。  
加分项  
1-熟悉交易系统。  
2-有 Rust 开发经验。  
3-有跨链、Layer2 、预言机相关开发经验。  
4-活跃的开源社区贡献者，或有相关的技术博客和分享。  
  
TG：@jtx_2023

亿美元，提供加密资产流动性研究和策略服务。我们致力于打造开放协作的工作环境，欢迎富有激情的人才加入！

postTitle: [招聘]Next.js 开发，外企远程工作，英语需要全英会议交流能力
descContent:
Senior Next.js Frontend Engineer (Vercel)  
  
💼 Employment Type: Full-time (Remote)  
💰 Salary: Based on experience + performance-based bonuses  
🗓️ Start Date: ASAP  
🖥️ Department: Software Development / Engineering  
  
About Us  
At travSIM, we help travellers stay connected worldwide through a wide range
of SIM and eSIM solutions. We’re expanding fast and are now looking for a
skilled Next.js Frontend Engineer to join our engineering team. You’ll be
responsible for delivering a high-performing e-commerce website with Stripe
integration, built on Next.js and deployed on Vercel.  
  
Our backend engineers own the NestJS backend — your focus will be building a
clean, scalable, and performant frontend integrated with Payload CMS and
external APIs.  
  
Read Before Applying  
🚫 Do Not Apply If:  
• You do not have proven, hands-on experience with Next.js (App Router & RSC)
and Vercel deployments.  
• You have not worked on frontend payment flows using Stripe in production.  
• You cannot demonstrate practical experience with Payload CMS.  
• You are not comfortable working in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.  
  
What You’ll Be Doing  
You will take full ownership of the frontend delivery for a global e-commerce
platform, working closely with backend engineers and product teams to ensure
seamless API and CMS integration.  
  
Core Responsibilities  
• Develop, test, and maintain a Next.js + Vercel e-commerce frontend.  
• Integrate Stripe payments (Payment Element, Checkout, Apple Pay, Google Pay,
3DS flows).  
• Implement Payload CMS integration, including live previews, block-based
content, and revalidation triggers.  
• Ensure high performance and SEO (Core Web Vitals, structured data, i18n
routing).  
• Build responsive and accessible UI with Tailwind CSS following WCAG 2.1
fundamentals.  
• Implement robust API integration and data caching (SWR / React Query).  
• Handle forms and validation with React Hook Form + Zod/Yup.  
• Write and maintain unit, e2e, and performance tests (Jest/RTL, Playwright,
Lighthouse CI).  
• Monitor and improve quality (Sentry, GA4, A/B testing, feature flags).  
• Apply modern security and best practices (XSS/CSRF mitigation, secure
headers, secrets management).  
  
Required Skills & Experience  
• Strong hands-on experience with Next.js (App Router & RSC).  
• Practical knowledge of Vercel deployments & environments.  
• Proficiency in React + TypeScript with modern hooks and state management.  
• Experience integrating Stripe frontend payment flows.  
• Proven work with Payload CMS and content-driven routing.  
• Strong grounding in performance, SEO, and accessibility fundamentals.  
• Experience writing and maintaining unit/e2e tests.  
• Solid understanding of frontend security practices.  
  
Nice-to-Have (Bonus Skills)  
• Familiarity with Prisma/Postgres concepts and Redis caching.  
• Experience with large-scale i18n and localisation.  
• Exposure to growth and analytics tools (PostHog, GTM server-side, affiliate
tracking).  
• Knowledge of customer tooling integrations (Crisp/Intercom).  
  
Why Join Us  
• Build high-performance web platforms with direct impact on global
travellers.  
• Collaborate with an international team of engineers and product experts.  
• Opportunity to work on cutting-edge frontend tech (Next.js + Vercel).  
  
If you’re ready to deliver world-class frontend experiences, we’d love to hear
from you!  
  
Please send your resume to [yang@travsim.com](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection).

postTitle: Software Engineer, iOS Core Product at Speechify, Inc.
jobTitle: Software Engineer, iOS Core Product at Speechify, Inc.
descContent:
The mission of Speechify is to make sure that reading is never a barrier to
learning.

Over 50 million people use Speechify’s text-to-speech products to turn
whatever they’re reading – PDFs, books, Google Docs, news articles, websites –
into audio, so they can read faster, read more, and remember more. Speechify’s
text-to-speech reading products include its iOS app, Android App, Mac App,
Chrome Extension, and Web App. Google recently named Speechify the Chrome
Extension of the Year and Apple named Speechify its App of the Day.

Today, nearly 200 people around the globe work on Speechify in a 100%
distributed setting – Speechify has no office. These include frontend and
backend engineers, AI research scientists, and others from Amazon, Microsoft,
and Google, leading PhD programs like Stanford, high growth startups like
Stripe, Vercel, Bolt, and many founders of their own companies.

**Overview**

With the growth of our iOS app, being the #18 productivity app in the App
Store category and also our recent recognition as Apple's 2025 Design Award
for Inclusivity, we find the need for a Senior iOS Engineer to help us support
the new user base as well as work on new and exciting projects to push our
missing forward.

This is a key role and ideal for someone who thinks strategically, enjoys
fast-paced environments, passionate about making product decisions, and has
experience building great user experiences that delight users.

We are a flat organization that allows anyone to become a leader by showing
excellent technical skills and delivering results consistently and fast. Work
ethic, solid communication skills, and obsession with winning are paramount.

Our interview process involves several technical interviews and we aim to
complete them within 1 week.

**What Yo****u’****ll Do**

  * Opportunity to lead key engineering and product decisions
  * Actively shipping production code for the Speechify iOS app
  * Work within a dedicated product team
  * Participate in product discussions to shape the product roadmap
  * Maintain and enhance the existing complex app architecture

**An Ideal Candidate Should Have**

  * Experience. You've worked on products that scaled to a large user base
  * Track record. You have worked on various products from inception to decent traction. You have been responsible for engineering the product
  * Customer obsession. We expect every team member whose responsibilities directly impact customers to be constantly obsessed about providing the best possible experience
  * Product thinking. You make thoughtful decisions about the evolution of your product and support internal teams and designers into taking the right direction
  * Speed. You work quickly to generate ideas and know how to decide which things can ship now and what things need time
  * Focus. We’re a high-growth startup with a busy, remote team. You know how and when to engage or be heads down
  * Technical skills. Swift, SwiftUI

**Technical Requirements:**

  * Swift Programming Language
  * SwiftUI experience
  * Experience in Multithreading Programming
  * Working with CI/CD infrastructure
  * Experience with Fastlane
  * SOLID principles, the ability to write every single class according to SOLID
  * Experience with Git and understanding of different Git strategies

**What We offer:**

  * A fast-growing environment where you can help shape the company and product
  * An entrepreneurial crew that supports risk, intuition, and hustle
  * The opportunity to make a big impact in a transformative industry
  * A competitive salary, a collegiate atmosphere, and a commitment to building a great asynchronous culture
  * Work on a product that millions of people use and where daily feedback includes users sharing that they cried when they first found the product because it was so impactful on their lives
  * Support people with learning differences like Dyslexia, ADD, Low Vision, Concussions, Autism, and Second Language Learners, and give reading superpowers to professionals all over the world
  * Work in one of the fastest growing sectors of tech: Intersection of Artificial Intelligence and Audio 

**Think you’re a good fit for this job?**

Tell us more about yourself and why you're interested in the role when you
apply.  
And don’t forget to include links to your portfolio and LinkedIn.

**Not looking but know someone who would make a great fit?**

Refer them!

**Speechify is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace.**

Speechify does not discriminate on the basis of race, national origin, gender,
gender identity, sexual orientation, protected veteran status, disability,
age, or other legally protected status.

postTitle: Product Marketing Lead at Matter Labs
jobTitle: Product Marketing Lead at Matter Labs
descContent:
### **About Matter Labs**

Matter Labs is the creator of **zkSync** , a leading zero-knowledge rollup
advancing Ethereum scalability with the security, transparency, and trust
assumptions enterprises and institutions require. Our mission is to accelerate
global adoption of zero-knowledge technology by enabling scalable, high-
performance, and cost-efficient blockchain infrastructure suitable for both
open ecosystems and regulated environments.

We collaborate with enterprises, financial institutions, and global
organizations exploring blockchain for settlement, payments, tokenization, and
next-generation financial systems.

### **About the Role**

We are hiring a **Product Marketing Lead – Institutional & Enterprise** who
will define how zkSync’s technology is positioned, understood, and adopted by
**banks, fintechs, asset managers, corporates, and regulated market
participants**.

You will build the narratives, GTM strategies, and industry-focused product
marketing programs that help traditional finance and enterprise stakeholders
understand the value, feasibility, and business impact of zero-knowledge
technology.

This role is ideal for someone who can translate advanced blockchain concepts
into compelling, commercially relevant stories for executives, technical
teams, and product buyers across the institutional ecosystem.

### **What You’ll Do**

### **Positioning & Messaging**

  * Build tailored narratives that communicate zkSync’s value for enterprise and institutional use cases—including tokenization, settlements, compliance tooling, privacy solutions, and scalable infrastructure deployment.

  * Translate technical product capabilities into business outcomes meaningful to regulated financial institutions and large enterprises.

### **GTM & Launch Strategy**

  * Own GTM and launch planning for enterprise-focused products, integrations, and features.

  * Partner with product, BD, compliance, and engineering teams to bring institutional solutions to market clearly, responsibly, and competitively.

### **Market Intelligence**

  * Conduct deep market research on the institutional blockchain landscape—tokenization trends, L2 adoption, regulatory movement, competing architectures, and enterprise needs.

  * Map buyer personas, decision-making processes, procurement barriers, and pain points in TradFi and enterprise environments.

### **Content & Enablement**

  * Create high-quality materials for enterprise audiences:

    * executive briefs

    * solution one-pagers

    * pitch decks

    * institutional case studies

    * whitepapers and product overviews

    * market analyses for BD and ecosystem partners

  * Build frameworks and messaging that support sales, partnership teams, and enterprise solution engineers.

### **Stakeholder Engagement**

  * Work closely with financial institutions, enterprise prospects, and ecosystem partners to design messaging that resonates with non-crypto-native stakeholders.

  * Support participation in industry events, regulatory discussions, and enterprise-focused activations.

### **Measurement & Optimization**

  * Define KPIs for institutional adoption and campaign performance.

  * Use analytics and feedback loops to refine messaging and prioritize product-market fit for enterprise and TradFi segments.

### **What We’re Looking For**

  * 5+ years in **product marketing** , **enterprise marketing** , or **solution marketing** , ideally within fintech, blockchain infrastructure, enterprise SaaS, or financial technology.

  * Strong understanding of **financial institutions** , enterprise buyer behavior, and multi-stakeholder product adoption cycles.

  * Ability to articulate sophisticated technical concepts to non-technical executives and regulated industry audiences.

  * Experience collaborating with product, sales, BD, and engineering teams in complex environments.

  * Proven ability to craft compelling narratives for high-stakes audiences (C-suite, regulators, enterprise product teams).

### **Nice to Have**

  * Experience marketing to **banks** , **payment providers** , **exchanges** , **custodians** , **asset managers** , or **financial market infrastructure** players.

  * Understanding of **zero-knowledge proofs** , rollups, tokenization, or blockchain scalability.

  * Prior work launching B2B or enterprise-grade blockchain products.

  * Experience in global markets or regulated jurisdictions.

postTitle: People Operations Leader
descContent:
**Summary**

The premier luxury lifestyle company featured in Forbes is seeking a People
Operations Lead to serve as the connective layer between the CEO and the rest
of the organization. This role is a blend of People Ops, internal Chief of
Staff, and leadership development. You will build the team, train managers,
strengthen accountability, improve onboarding, run hiring pipelines, manage
KPIs, and take over the internal workflow and questions that currently go to
the CEO.  
This is a hands-on, execution-focused role for someone who thrives on
structure, clarity, coaching, and building a high-performing team in a luxury
service environment.  
  
**Role Overview**  
You will design and manage the systems that help the team perform at a high
standard. You will ensure the CEO’s time is protected by serving as the
primary point of contact for internal questions, decisions, and follow-up. You
will raise the bar for leadership, communication, and performance across the
team.  
  
**Key Responsibilities**  
  
** _Leadership Support_**  
• Act as the first stop for internal questions, decisions, and clarifications.  
• Translate the CEO’s priorities into clear instructions and expectations.  
• Follow up with team members to ensure deadlines and deliverables stay on
track.  
• Manage internal communication flow so the CEO is only involved when
necessary.  
  
_**Team Management and Accountability**_  
• Run weekly team meetings, check-ins, and accountability rhythms.  
• Hold team members and managers accountable to deadlines, KPIs, and quality
standards.  
• Identify performance gaps early and address them with structure or coaching.  
• Support managers in becoming stronger leaders who own their teams.  
  
_**Hiring and Onboarding**_  
• Manage hiring pipelines, coordinate interviews, and screen candidates.  
• Build structured onboarding processes, success metrics, and 60-day plans.  
• Create clarity for new hires through documentation, checklists, and
expectations.  
• Ensure every new hire is trained effectively and fully integrated.  
  
_**Training and Development**_  
• Build and deliver training programs for both managers and ICs.  
• Coach managers on feedback, delegation, leadership, and communication.  
• Create internal training materials, playbooks, and learning paths.  
• Lead performance reviews and ensure clear development plans.  
  
_**KPI and Performance Managemen**_ t  
• Define KPIs and scorecards in collaboration with leadership.  
• Track performance metrics and provide insights to the CEO.  
• Ensure each team member knows their responsibilities and metrics.  
• Improve dashboards, reporting tools, and performance rhythms.  
  
**_Process Improvement_**  
• Build and document SOPs, policies, and workflows across the team.  
• Identify bottlenecks and operational inefficiencies and improve them.  
• Standardize internal communication for clarity and predictability.  
• Ensure systems scale with the company’s growth.  
  
**Who You Are**  
• A strong communicator who brings clarity, calm, and confidence to teams.  
• A builder who loves creating systems, structures, and processes.  
• A natural coach who develops people and elevates managers.  
• Highly organized with excellent follow-through.  
• Confident holding others accountable, even senior team members.  
• Comfortable taking internal load off the CEO and enabling her to operate at
a strategic level.  
• Thrives in a fast-paced, founder-led environment.

**Requirements**  
• 3 plus years in People Ops, HR, Chief of Staff, or Operations roles.  
• Experience training managers and running performance systems.  
• Strong background in hiring, onboarding, and team development.  
• Highly comfortable with KPIs, scorecards, and performance reviews.  
• Skilled in Monday.com, Google Workspace, documentation, and communication
tools.  
• Available during EST hours (8am to 5pm) with flexibility for time-sensitive
issues.  
  
**Why Join Us**  
You will help build the internal engine that powers a luxury company. You will
work closely with the CEO, improve team performance, strengthen culture, and
create a high-functioning environment where people thrive. This role has
significant influence and ownership.

Please mention the word **GAINED** when applying to show you read the job post
completely (#RMTAzLjE2My42Ni4xODI=). This is a feature to avoid fake spam
applicants. Companies can search these words to find applicants that read this
and instantly see they're human.  
  

## Salary and compensation

  
$80,000 — $150,000/year
jobCategory: 人力资源,项目管理,咨询

postTitle: Customer Service Director Role
descContent:
**Summary**  
Sienna Charles, a premier luxury lifestyle company featured in Forbes is
seeking a hands-on Customer Service Director to lead and elevate our entire CS
function. This is a producer role for someone who builds systems, improves
processes, solves problems quickly, and drives consistent performance across a
team. You will lead the CS team, refine SOPs, handle escalations, and create
scalable workflows that support a high-touch luxury client experience.  
  
**Key Responsibilities**  
  
 _**Customer Service Leadership**_  
\- Oversee and coach the CS team day-to-day, ensuring high-touch, accurate
client support.  
\- Establish clear service standards and ensure the team consistently meets
them.  
\- Handle escalations directly and resolve issues with urgency and
professionalism.  
\- Audit service quality, identify gaps, and implement fixes immediately.  
\- Lead ongoing training, expectation-setting, and performance management.  
\- Maintain up-to-date SOPs that reflect best practice service delivery.  
  
_**Operational Execution**_  
\- Translate the CEO’s vision into clear plans and oversee execution across
the CS function.  
\- Build new processes, checklists, and workflows that scale with company
growth.  
\- Identify breakdowns or inefficiencies in CS operations and fix them fast.  
\- Maintain dashboards, KPIs, and weekly service performance reviews.  
  
_**Process Improvement and Automation**_  
\- Improve workflows using Monday.com, Zendesk, Guru, and automation tools.  
\- Create tools, templates, and automations that reduce manual work and
eliminate errors.  
\- Continuously refine CS systems for speed, clarity, and accuracy.  
  
_**Problem Solving and Escalation Management**_  
\- Act as the first point of escalation for client or operational service
issues.  
\- Troubleshoot problems hands-on rather than delegating without alignment.  
\- Ensure smooth service continuity and strong client satisfaction at all
times.  
  
_**Technology Oversight**_  
\- Manage daily use of CS-related systems and coordinate with developers or
vendors when improvements are needed.  
\- Ensure our tech stack supports high-quality, efficient, and scalable
service delivery.  
  
**Who You Are**  
\- You have a builder mindset and fix broken systems rather than just managing
them.  
\- You are service-driven and care deeply about tone, accuracy, and client
experience.  
\- You move quickly and maintain strong attention to detail.  
\- You communicate clearly and keep leadership and the team aligned.  
\- You take full ownership of outcomes and do not wait for others to solve
problems.  
  
**Requirements**  
\- 3 plus years leading customer service teams in a high-touch or high-
expectation environment.  
\- Experience improving SOPs, workflows, and team structures.  
\- Comfort using Monday.com, Zendesk, Guru, Google Workspace, and basic
automations.  
\- Proven ability to run a CS team and drive high-quality execution end-to-
end.  
\- Availability in EST timezone, 8am to 5pm, with some weekend flexibility.  
  
**Why Join Us**  
This is a high-impact director-level role where you will shape and lead the
entire CS function for a luxury brand. You will work closely with the CEO,
guide a team, and build the systems that enable the company to scale with
excellence.  

Please mention the word **BONUSES** when applying to show you read the job
post completely (#RMTAzLjE2My42Ni4xODI=). This is a feature to avoid fake spam
applicants. Companies can search these words to find applicants that read this
and instantly see they're human.  
  

## Salary and compensation

  
$70,000 — $150,000/year

postTitle: 远程后端Golang
descContent:
Golang后端开发工程师
工作职责：
1. 使用 Golang 进行高并发分布式系统开发，打造稳定高效的业务服务
2. 设计并实现基于 gRPC / RESTful API 的微服务系统
3. 优化数据库架构与性能，支持 MySQL / PostgreSQL / Redis / MongoDB / TiDB 等
4. 基于 Goroutine、Channel、锁机制实现高效并发处理
5. 协同 DevOps 团队推动 CI/CD、K8s、Docker 等运维效率提升
6. 提供高可用、易扩展的 API 接口支持前端与移动端使用
7. 推动代码重构与系统性能优化，提升系统可维护性与稳定性
8. 通过 Prometheus、Grafana、ELK 构建服务监控体系
9. 关注系统安全，包括权限控制、数据加密、身份验证等模块设计

任职要求
 本科及以上学历，计算机相关专业，6年及以上后端开发经验
 熟练掌握 Golang，理解其并发模型：Goroutine、Channel、Context
 熟悉微服务架构，有 gRPC / RESTful / Protobuf 开发经验
 精通主流数据库和缓存机制，具备 SQL 优化与数据结构设计能力
 熟悉分布式系统设计、高并发编程与消息队列（Kafka / RabbitMQ / NSQ）
 掌握 Docker / Kubernetes 等容器化部署与运维工具
 良好的数据结构与算法功底，理解网络协议与操作系统原理
 掌握 Git，具备良好的代码规范与团队协作能力

加分项（Nice-to-have）
区块链相关经验，熟悉数据源架构交互与安全要点
有 Trading 系统/行情服务经验，了解撮合、风控或 TradingView 二次开发
深入使用 Prometheus + Grafana / OpenTelemetry 打造可观测性体系
有架构落地或小组管理 经验，能推动规范与技术选型
具备数据驱动能力：可与产品/数据同学基于指标做迭代优化

薪酬福利·工时假期
薪资待遇：15-20K
工作时间：10:00-19:00（一小时午休）
假期政策：周休一+国内法定节假日

有意向者可投简历至邮箱或留言介绍我电你联系

postTitle: 【长期合作】生活薰香短视频/直播切片剪辑师招募
jobTitle: 生活薰香短视频/直播切片剪辑师
descContent:
​📢 【长期合作】生活薰香短视频/直播切片剪辑师招募
---------------------------

​我们正在寻找一位专业、有热情、能长期稳定配合的短视频剪辑师，一同打造高转化率的“生活薰香”类电商内容。

### ​一、 剪辑师能力与经验要求 (硬性条件)

1.  ​**经验丰富：** 具备**至少 2 至 3 年**以上的短视频或电商内容剪辑经验。
2.  ​**专业技能：** 熟练掌握剪辑软件操作，并能\*\*灵活运用“关键帧”\*\*来实现画面特效与动态调整，让视觉呈现更具冲击力。
3.  ​**直播切片专家：** 深入理解直播带货逻辑，能从我方提供的直播素材中精准提取出**产品“卖点”与“爆点”**，并通过精炼的剪辑节奏达成高效传播。
    *   ​**我方配合：** 我方会提供简略的内容指导，协助您定位核心信息。
4.  ​**视觉与叙事能力：** 剪辑风格需符合电商产品调性，具备强烈的**叙事感、美观度、和镜头冲击力**，能有效提升观众停留率。

### ​二、 薪酬与合作模式 (您提供的优势)

1.  ​**薪酬标准：** 按完成视频时长计算，**每分钟支付 100 元人民币**的剪辑费用。
2.  ​**工作量保证：** 提供**源源不断、稳定充足的工作量**，**每周至少有 20 条**短视频/切片剪辑任务可供执行。
3.  ​**合作关系：** 寻求可以**长期、稳定配合**的伙伴。

### ​三、 应征者必须提供的信息

​为快速评估您的专业能力，请应征者在联系时务必附上以下信息：

1.  ​**个人简历：** 简述您的相关工作经验年限。
2.  ​**得意作品：** **请附上 5 条您最满意、最能体现您剪辑功力的作品链接** (特别是电商/直播带货/高转化类型的作品)。
3.  ​**预期合作模式：** (例如：日结/周结、预计完成一条 1 分钟视频所需时长等)。
jobCategory: 视频剪辑,内容创作,运营,市场营销,设计

postTitle: Excellent Frontend Developer
descContent:
**Position:** Lead Frontend Developer

**Location:** Fully remote, within GMT (London) up to GMT+8 (Singapore) time
zones

**Schedule:** Full-time

**Salary:** Daily rate ranging $300 - $500 / day, depending on experience and
qualifications

**Contract Type:** Independent contractor (you must be able to invoice
Parseur)

**Vacation:** 20 to 40 leave days per year (unpaid)

## What You’ll Do

You'll replace our co-founder as Lead Frontend Developer.

You’ll be responsible for maintaining and evolving both the Parseur **web app
(React SPA)** and our **marketing site (custom static site)** , ensuring
world-class user experience and design consistency.

**App (React SPA) development**

  * Implement new features, design, improve UX/UI, and fix bugs
  * Collaborate with the backend team on API integrations
  * Maintain code quality, performance, and test coverage
  * **Note:** This is a 10-year-old React app that still uses some “vintage” libraries like Redux, Redux-Form, and React 16. You should be comfortable working with these older technologies at first. Over time, you’ll help modernize the codebase, carefully and pragmatically, keeping things simple and avoiding unnecessary new dependencies.

**Marketing static site development**

  * Develop and maintain the marketing static site and landing pages in collaboration with product and content teams
  * Design high-converting, mobile-responsive pages
  * Optimize for Technical SEO, GEO and Conversion

**Additional technical contributions**

  * Handle Level 3 support: investigate technical issues reported by Customer Success, collaborate with backend team on fixes
  * Maintain and enhance public technical documentation (e.g., API references, developer guides)
  * Take part in the on-call roster (roughly one week per month, and yes, you’ll get paid extra for it)
  * Optionally act as a backup for the backend dev (depending on your profile)

## About You

**This role comes with a lot of autonomy and responsibilities. We’re looking
for senior developer with high agency (self-starter, curious and
autonomous).**

### Mandatory

  * 5+ years of experience (or equivalent skills) with JavaScript, React, HTML, CSS, Tailwind, Node.js, and REST APIs
  * Demonstrable experience designing landing/product pages that convert
  * Proven experience creating responsive, mobile-first web designs
  * Excellent in written and spoken English
  * Excellent communicator and team player

### Preferred

  * Experience in B2B SaaS environments
  * Familiarity with frontend testing frameworks (React Testing Library, jsdom, Playwright)
  * Knowledge of CRO principles, SEO and GEO
  * Experience with i18n and localization
  * Some exposure to Python/Django backend
  * Experience with async and remote collaboration

### Nice to Have

  * Visual design or animation skills (CSS animations, Canva, Photopea, etc.)
  * Experience with serverless architectures (we use Cloudflare Workers)
  * Familiarity with automation platforms (Zapier, Make, n8n, Power Automate)

## Why Join Us?

  * **Impact:** You’ll be joining a small, senior team where your work directly shapes the user experience for thousands of businesses.
  * **Autonomy:** You’ll take full ownership of the user-facing experience across Parseur’s app and website.
  * **Flexibility:** Work remotely in autonomy with few meetings (1-2 per week).
  * **Growth & Rewards:** We value and reward loyalty. Long-term collaborators are recognized for their impact through yearly rate raises and profit-sharing.
  * **Adventure:** We host an annual one-week team retreat somewhere in the world for brainstorming, building, and bonding.

## How We Work?

We’re a **remote-first** company that values asynchronous communication and
deep work. We collaborate using Slack and Notion, and keep meetings to a
minimum, usually on Mondays.

We like to **keep things simple**. Your success won’t be measured by how much
code you write, but by how elegantly you can solve problems. The best solution
is often the simplest one, fewer lines of code, fewer moving parts, fewer
dependencies, and easier maintenance. You’ll earn praise for removing
unnecessary complexity from our codebase, and removing dependencies from our
package.json, not adding to it.

## About Parseur

Parseur is an industry-leading AI document processing platform that helps
businesses automate data extraction from emails, PDFs, and other documents.

Our mission is simple: eliminate manual data entry and empower businesses with
automation. We’ve been around for around 10 years and profitable since 2017,
proudly bootstrapped and independent. Without external investors, we only
answer to our customers to drive our growth.

We’re a fully remote, async-first team of 5 spread across 5 countries in 4
continents, spanning 12 time zones. We think long-term and work at a rapid,
but sustainable pace (it’s a marathon, not a sprint). We value autonomy and
efficiency.

We’re an automation company. If an internal task is repetitive, we automate
it!

Learn more: [About Us](https://parseur.com/about) | [Meet the Team](https://parseur.com/team) | [Try Parseur](https://app.parseur.com/signup?utm_medium=website&utm_campaign=job-frontend)

## Questions?

Send us a message via our [Parseur
profile](https://www.linkedin.com/company/parseur.com) on LinkedIn.

**If you know someone who’d be perfect for this role, please share it with
them!**

Please mention the word **FOREMOST** when applying to show you read the job
post completely (#RMTAzLjE4MS4xNTMuMjc=). This is a feature to avoid fake spam
applicants. Companies can search these words to find applicants that read this
and instantly see they're human.  
  

## Salary and compensation

  
$70,000 — $120,000/year  
  

## Benefits

🌎 Distributed team

⏰ Async

🏖 Unlimited vacation

🏔 Company retreats

💰 Profit sharing

👀 No monitoring system

🎅 We hire old (and young)

postTitle: 嵌入式硬件工程师
descContent:
**项目介绍**

我们需要在Nordic nRF5340双核架构上，构建一个能够实时处理高带宽音频流的低功耗系统。面临的挑战包括在BLE连接保持活跃的同时，通过 QSPI 接口向Flash写入大量音频数据而不发生阻塞；在微安级别的功耗预算下，通过IMU和PPG传感器融合算法实现精准的语音活动检测唤醒。

**核心职责**

1. 核心音频与存储引擎开发
- 构建无阻塞环形缓冲区，设计并实现基于QSPI Flash的高速存储机制。必须解决Flash Page Program延迟与音频采样中断之间的时序冲突，确保录音零丢帧。
- 音频管道：编写PDM麦克风驱动，实现音频数据的DMA采集、分帧、以及轻量级压缩算法的嵌入式实现。
    
2. 基于Zephyr的系统架构
- 双核IPC通信：设计业务逻辑与蓝牙协议栈之间的高效通信机制优化吞吐量。
- 实时操作系统 (RTOS) 调优：精细化管理线程优先级和工作队列，防止高优先级的BLE广播打断音频写入逻辑。
    
3. 传感器融合与状态机
- 编写高效的有限状态机，管理设备从Deep Sleep到Active Recording的毫秒级唤醒流程。
- 整合加速度计和PPG光电心率数据流，实现基于生物信号的智能触发逻辑。
    
4. 功耗与性能优化
- 使用Power Profiler Kit进行代码级的功耗分析，排查并消除任何不必要的电流泄漏。
- 实现Flash数据加密(AES-128)及BLE安全配对流程。

**职位要求**
- 5年以上嵌入式C/C++开发经验，必须有RTOS环境下的复杂多线程开发经验。
- 深入理解nRF5340/nRF52芯片架构。熟练掌握nRF Connect SDK (NCS)，包括Device Tree, Kconfig, Bootloader (MCUboot) 配置。
- 能手写或深度修改 I2C, SPI, QSPI, PDM, UART等外设驱动，不依赖现成的满是Bug的库。
- 熟练使用 J-Link, 逻辑分析仪 (Logic Analyzer), 示波器调试时序和总线问题。
- 加分项：ODM 协作经验，能够阅读原理图，并在必要时指出代工厂硬件设计中的电气隐患（如电源纹波、信号干扰）。熟悉 DSP (数字信号处理) 基础算法。

**职位待遇**
- 远程兼职期间薪资18,000元/月起，不强制固定工时，只要能按时交付里程碑代码，可以利用业余时间远程完成。100%远程办公，无需打卡，无需坐班。
- 当原型机验证成功，双方合作顺畅，我们希望邀请您加入成为全职核心员工。届时重新商定全职 薪资，并提供期权。

**为了节省时间以及判断您是否合适，需要考虑下这个问题：**
*"在nRF5340+Zephyr架构中，当你使用LittleFS在外部QSPI Flash上进行高频音频写入时，如何设计线程模型以避免阻塞BLE协议栈的实时性要求？如果Flash擦写导致了长时间的CPU占用，你会使用什么具体的Zephyr机制（如 Async API, DMA, Workqueue Offloading）来解决？"*

符合要求的同学请留言以及简要介绍或露脸帖链接，合适的同学我们会主动加电联系。
jobCategory: 后端开发,算法,DevOps/MLOps,技术支持

下面请一定注意看，我希望你看清楚再投递。
我们做什么，我们依托一家成人用品厂，做线下成人用娃娃的体验店。（此项目完全合法合规，不用担心，没有法律风险）
私密性的活动，虽然没有法律风险，但是不能广而告之，所以是私域的形式开展。
理解成人娃娃的现实意义，如果你是一个无脑且接收不了新鲜事物，且对于性话题非常敏感，且反感的人，切勿投递，切勿投递，切勿投递。
我希望找的人，你对于性持开放态度，甚至对于这些保持一种热爱就更好了。理解娃娃这种工具，对于男性的帮助。理解虚拟物件对于人产生的现实意义。（如果你喜欢手办，popmart的相信你可以有点理解）。
合作方式，固定薪资，我不需要你all in付出，就是个兼职零活，按月付费，一周工作20小时。时间你灵活安排。月薪4000元，每月收益的10%，作为额外的奖励。
我希望你最好在杭州，因为实体店在杭州，第一步的私域也是从杭州做。这样我们实地交流和考察就不是障碍。
没有私域经验or不感兴趣，不要留言，不要留言，不要留言

descContent:
Ant.fun 是新一代 Web3 去中心化交易平台，获得 Mim Stream 、Solana
等数十家顶级机构及知名投资人的战略投资。平台总部设立于香港，是最具潜力的行业领先方向和公司。

岗位职责

  * 负责 Ant.fun DEX 平台的产品规划、设计与迭代
  * 深入研究 DeFi 市场和用户需求，制定产品策略和发展路线图
  * 设计交易挖矿、社交化 DeFi 等创新功能，提升用户体验
  * 撰写产品需求文档（ PRD ），推动产品从 0 到 1 的落地
  * 协调技术、设计、运营团队，确保产品按时高质量交付
  * 跟踪产品数据，分析用户行为，持续优化产品功能
  * 关注行业动态和竞品分析，保持产品竞争力

任职要求 基础要求：

  * 985 ，211 本科及以上学历
  * 优秀的学习能力和为结果负责的工作态度
  * 优秀的产品设计能力和用户体验意识
  * 熟练使用 Axure 、Figma 等原型设计工具
  * 具备良好的逻辑思维、沟通协调和项目管理能力
  * 数据驱动思维，能够通过数据分析指导产品决策
  * 对新技术和新趋势保持敏锐洞察力

加分项

  * 🔥 有 Web3/DeFi/DEX 产品经验者优先
  * 熟悉区块链技术原理和 DeFi 产品逻辑
  * 有加密货币交易经验，了解用户交易习惯
  * 有从 0 到 1 打造成功产品的经验
  * 有海外产品经验，具备全球化视野
  * 英语读写流利，能够阅读英文技术文档

我们提供

  * 💰 行业顶尖薪资 + 期权/代币激励
  * 🌟 主导创新产品设计，直接影响百万级用户
  * 🎯 扁平化管理，快速决策，想法直达高层
  * 🌍 国际化团队，与全球顶尖人才协作
  * 📚 丰富的学习资源和行业交流机会

2️⃣ 回答客户疑问、维护粉丝关系 & 持续增强品牌好感& 关注奢旅趋势和用户讨论点
3️⃣ KOL / 旅行博主合作：寻找合适的旅行类、小红书达人、奢旅向博主；对接合作、沟通内容、跟踪效果；参与行程的沟通与素材协调
4️⃣ PR / 媒体合作：与旅行媒体、杂志等媒体合作输出品牌故事、媒体物料；与旅行社 / 目的地平台建立合作关系。
5️⃣ 数据复盘与优化：每周/每月复盘数据：阅读量、收藏、转化、达人投放表现并给出策略建议，持续迭代内容方向
 
🎯 我们希望你具备
• 母语中文，并能用英文沟通
• 深度了解中国社媒生态
• 有独立运营小红书等平台的经验
• 有奢旅、生活方式或品牌类写作基础
• 能与 KOL、媒体沟通
加分项：
• 有奢旅 / 酒店 / 目的地营销经验
• 会剪辑短视频或能协同剪辑师
• 了解百度 SEO / 微信支付生态
🧭 工作方式
• 独立、自驱、有创意
• 对中西文化差异敏感
• 对奢旅用户心理有理解
• 工作时效：中国工作时间内 1–2 小时内回复内部消息
• 每周一次项目对齐、每月一次深度复盘会议
💰 薪酬与合作方式
• 薪资根据经验评估

• 可长期合作，远程工作氛围，尊重自由

• 你运营过的账号链接
• 奢旅/旅行类内容示例 2–3 个
• 你的薪资期待（全职 / 兼职 / 按周或按小时都可以）

postTitle:
招聘：
Execution Quant/Quant Trader
Perp DEX 运营与市场主管
非洲区域负责人
APAC Community Lead
DevRel Engineer
descContent:
Position 一：Execution Quant/Desk Quant  
Job Type: Full-Time ，Onsite Hong Kong （公司提供 EP ）  
Salary：HKD 55-90K/month + 绩效奖金  
PS：  
理想候选人需具备扎实的定量分析背景（数学、统计学或金融工程），并在线性产品（现货与永续合约/Crypto ）交易方面具备实盘经验。  
该职位将专注于实盘执行、自动化对冲与执行效率优化，在量化模型与实时交易之间搭建桥梁。  
任职要求：  
1 、中英文流利，数学、统计学、物理学或金融工程等相关专业硕士及以上学历；  
2 、3–8 年 执行量化 / 交易台量化 / 量化开发 经验，熟悉线性产品或期货类交易机制；  
3 、具备对市场微观结构、资金费率机制与流动性动态的深入理解。  
  
Position 二：Perp DEX 运营与市场主管  
Job Type: Full-Time ，Remote  
Salary：$ 5000-15000/month  
代币激励：享有平台长期代币激励计划（ Token Incentive Program ）  
-岗位定位  
中英文流利，会 日语/韩语 者优先；熟悉 Perp DEX 或 CEX
业务逻辑。负责制定并执行平台的市场与运营策略，深度结合交易产品特性，通过事件营销、社区建设与品牌传播，推动平台的用户增长、交易活跃度与全球品牌影响力。  
PS;  
（ 1 ）社区与社媒深耕  
（ 2 ）事件营销与热点联动  
（ 3 ）交易类活动策划与增长  
（ 4 ）团队管理与跨部门协作  
（ 5 ）参与过头部交易平台或 DeFi 项目的社区和运营建设或搭建（如 Binance 、OKX 、Bybit 、dYdX 、GMX
、Hyperliquid 、Lighter 、Monad 等）。  
  
  
Position 三： 非洲区域负责人  
Job Type: Full-Time ，香港/深圳  
核心诉求：有币圈經驗，有社媒運營经验、了解 BD 。  
职位职责：  
与潜在客户和战略合作伙伴识别、寻求并达成新的业务机会。  
与市场营销、销售和产品团队合作，制定并执行有效的销售策略和策略。  
在其他交易所拥有每月超过 1000 万美元的可验证交易量。  
进行市场调研和分析，以发现加密货币交易行业的新兴趋势和机遇。  
表公司出席行业活动、会议和贸易展会。  
制作演示文稿和提案，并向潜在合作伙伴展示我们的产品和服务。  
职位要求：  
了解期货交易和现货交易。  
至少 2 年业务拓展、销售或相关领域经验。  
在识别和达成新业务机会方面拥有成功经验。  
对加密货币交易行业和市场趋势有深入的了解。  
具备出色的人际交往、沟通和谈判技巧。  
能够流利使用英语  
能够与各种利益相关者合作并建立良好关系。  
能够独立工作并在紧迫的期限内交付成果。  
具备强大的分析和解决问题能力。  
负责非洲市场。 如果有些做市场运营类的想转型做区域负责人，也可以尝试这个机会。  
  
  
Position 四：APAC Community Lead  
Job Type: Full-Time ，remote  
Salary：$ 60-66K/y + 绩效奖金+Token 激励  
PS：  
1 、中英文精通，3 年以上跨平台社区规模化运营与活力提升的成功经验。  
2 、精通加密原生领域——DeFi 、NFT 、钱包、BTCFi 、迷因及文化  
3 、拥有线上线下加密活动协调经验  
4 、熟练运用社区运营及营销推广工具。  
（需要擅长社区运营和沟通，campaign 和活动设计、执行，并且过去和交易社区、kol 打交道比较多的人才）  
  
  
Position 五：DevRel Engineer  
Job Type: Full-Time ，remote  
Salary：$ 95-120K/y + 绩效奖金/Token 激励  
PS：  
1 、具备扎实的软件工程背景，拥有开发者工具或 Blockchain 应用开发经验。  
2 、拥有创建高质量技术内容（如博客文章、教程及文档）的成功经验。  
3 、具备开发者关系、技术布道或类似岗位经验，能有效提升开发者参与度与采用率。  
4 、拥有组织开发者专场活动、研讨会或培训课程的实践经验。  
5 、卓越的沟通与演示能力，能向技术与非技术受众清晰阐释复杂技术概念。  
6 、卓越的社交网络构建能力，具备与开发者、社区成员及生态合作伙伴高效协作的经验。  
7 、英语母语优先，能适应美国时区工作。  
（懂代码，已经写过的 dev 文档、出席演讲（或讲解）的视频、管理过的 dev 社区的情况）。  
  
  
还有其它相关技术以及非技术岗位，  
请携带简历咨询，谢谢，  
推荐合作成功有酬谢，

jobTitle: Golang工程师、前端工程师（React）、前端工程师（Nodejs方向）、Flutter工程师、SRE运维工程师
descContent:
Position 一：Golang 工程师（ 5-10 个 HC ）  
Job Type：Full-Time, Remote  
PS：  
1 、全日制双一流/211/985 本科及以上计算机专业，3/10 年工作经验（最近几年至少有一段头部互联网大厂任职背景，无 web3 任职经验要求），  
2 、熟练掌握 Golang 高并发编程，并理解其原理。

4 、熟练掌握中间件技术，包括 MySQL 、Redis 和 Kafka ，以及它们的基本原理。  
5 、开发和维护分布式微服务架构的能力。  
  
  
Position 二：前端工程师（ React ）（ 3 个 HC ）  
Job Type: Full-Time, Remote  
PS:  
1 、全日制双一流/211/985 计算机、软件工程等相关专业本科及以上学历（最近几年至少有一段头部互联网大厂任职背景，无 web3 任职经验要求）；  
2 、深入理解主流前端框架（ React ）；  
3 、5/8 前端开发经验，3 年以上 React 项目实战经验，精通 React 。  
  
Position 三: 前端工程师（ Nodejs 方向）（ 3 个 HC ）

1 、全日制双一流/211/985 计算机、软件工程等相关专业本科及以上学历（最近几年至少有一段头部互联网大厂任职背景，无 web3 任职经验要求）；  
2 、深入理解至少一种主流前端框架（ React/Vue/Angular ）；  
3 、5/8 前端开发经验，3 年以上 Node.js 中大型项目实战经验，精通 Node.js 生态（ Express/Koa/NestJS
），熟悉高并发、性能调优、内存泄漏排查。  
（前端 + 熟悉 Nodejs 和 服务端渲染）  
  
Position 四: Flutter app （ 3 个 HC ）

postTitle: Senior Performance Marketer (Full Remote - Worldwide) at EverAI
jobTitle: Senior Performance Marketer (Full Remote - Worldwide) at EverAI
descContent:
[](https://jobs.ashbyhq.com/everai/64c3f8c9-d7a6-4b21-8e75-345dc0139196/application?utm_source=remotive.com)

Our Vision & Products

 _**🚀 EverAI — Building the Future of AI Companionship**_

 _One of the Top 15 Largest & Fastest-Growing AI Companies in the World_

 _30+ Million Users in under 2 years — Help Us Reach 100M first, 500M next_

At **EverAI** , we’re shaping what it means to connect with AI. With **30+
million users and counting** , we're not just building products — we're
creating entirely new categories.

Our flagship product is the **world’s largest AI girlfriend/boyfriend
platform** , redefining relationships for millions. It is governed by our
proprietary moderation system, EverGuard — an internal AI designed to ensure
everything we build is **safe, ethical, and human-first**.

_And we’re only just getting started!_

  

Our Team

We are an enthusiastic, passionate and hardworking team of 70 people. Our
founding team has strong entrepreneurial experience building and scaling web
products from 0 to IPO.

**Alexis Soulopoulos **[CEO]

_• 10+ years in Tech Executive Leadership_

 _• Co-Founder Mad Paws Holdings (from 0 to IPO)_

_• Forbes 30 under 30 + Deloitte TechFast50 ’22 & ‘23_

**Michael Monin** [Co-founder & CTO]

_• 10+ years as CTO / COO (web2/web3), 1+ year in AI/LLM_

 _• Serial-entrepreneur: MTK Digital (exited / 0- >$20m revenue) and Zipchat
(AI Chatbot for E-commerce brands)_

**Thomas Lacroix **[Co-founder & CMO]

_• 8+ years in Customer Acquisition & E-commerce Growth_

 _• Serial-entrepreneur: Curatible (sold to Blackstone) and MTK Digital
(exited / 0- >$20m revenue)_

**Maruša Fasano **[CFO/Legal]

_• 25+ years in Finance, Strategy, M &A_

 _• Ex-CFO/M &A @Curatible (exited to Blackstone)_

_• Ex-President of the Board @SotremoSA (exited)_

_• Co-founder/CFO @SoftOne (exited)_

  

Your Role

This is a** hands-on role** for someone who can execute fast, iterate with
creative and funnel inputs, and scale what works. You’ll inherit high-
performing campaigns and work directly with our CMO to double down on growth.

You’ll then also have the opportunity to test and scale new channels (TikTok,
Meta, Snapchat, Native, ASA) depending on performance and market constraints.

  

Your Responsibilities

**Campaign Ownership and Scaling**

  * Take the lead on one or two paid acquisition channels across direct-buy and programmatic networks (e.g., ExoClick, TrafficStars, TrafficJunky), with potential to expand scope based on performance

  * Contribute to building scalable acquisition funnels — from execution to iteration — with aggressive growth targets in mind

  * Run high-velocity testing loops (creatives, audiences, placements) to improve CAC and LTV

**Performance Analysis and Strategy**

  * Monitor performance daily using tools like Voluum, GA4, and internal dashboards

  * Drive decision-making through deep analysis of CPA, ROAS, retention, and cohort behavior

  * Build and maintain internal reporting frameworks that guide strategic shifts and tactical moves

**Creative & Funnel Optimization**

  * Own the creative briefing process: define hooks, formats, and angles based on performance patterns

  * Collaborate closely with the content and product teams to launch and iterate on high-converting landing pages

  * Implement systems to reduce creative fatigue and increase speed of testing

**Partnership Management & Media Strategy**

  * Build strong relationships with traffic sources and negotiate premium placements and custom deals

  * Explore new acquisition opportunities (networks, formats, tools) and build internal evaluation criteria

  * Stay ahead of ecosystem changes (platform rules, algorithm shifts) and adapt strategy accordingly

**Automation & Scaling Systems**

  * Identify opportunities to streamline acquisition processes through automation and internal tools

  * Create SOPs, playbooks, and experiment pipelines for scaling campaigns efficiently

  

Challenges You’ll Tackle

  * Scale existing campaigns to 3x+ budget while maintaining CAC/ROAS goals

  * Contribute to growing the user base from 30M to 100M users in the next 12 months

  * Execute 0-to-1 testing in new channels

  * Improve conversion through landing page testing and funnel iteration

  * Own both creative input and analytical feedback loops

  

Your Qualifications

  

Hard Skills

Must-Haves

  * 4–10+ years in performance marketing or user acquisition

  * Proven track record managing $500K to $1M+/month in paid media spend

  * Full ownership of campaign execution, results, and optimization

  * Experience with Meta, TikTok, Snapchat, ASA, or native platforms

  * Analytical fluency: GA4, Voluum, tracking setups, dashboards

  * Strong creative instincts: can write briefs, analyze hooks, and iterate fast

  * Experience optimizing landing pages and funnel conversion

  * Comfortable with NSFW content and running campaigns on adult networks

Nice‑to‑Haves

  * Past exposure to subscription models and CAC/LTV frameworks

  * Familiarity with DSPs and programmatic environments

  * Experience in sensitive or regulated verticals (e.g. dating, femtech, telehealth)

  * Track record of scaling UA for mobile apps

  

Soft Skills

🗣 Strong communication & collaborative skills (perfectly fluent in English)

🎯 Goal-oriented, ownership and commitment

⚡️ Doer mindset - we are moving fast and need people who can balance
execution, planning, and strategy

⏱️ Obsessive about speed, performance and iteration

🧢 Humble - willing to learn, open to feedback

🍭 #NSFW - Comfortable building products based on uncensored models and content

  

Why EverAI?

📈 **Exponential Growth** : From 30M+ users in 18 months, to 100M next — and
500M beyond

🚀 **Track Record of Category-Creating Innovation** : We consistently launch
**world-first AI applications** — setting the pace, not following it

🌍 **Global Impact** : Top-tier user growth, real-world adoption, and cultural
relevance

🧠 **Proven Leadership** : A senior team that’s **launched, scaled, and exited
& IPO’d multiple scale ups** — now fully focused on reshaping AI companionship

👥 **Elite Remote Team** : 100% remote and built to win — world-class talent
from **Tier 1 tech companies** , with a culture of ownership, velocity, and
radical creativity

🛡️ **Ethical Core** : Our AI ecosystem is governed by **EverGuard, our
proprietary AI moderation technology** , ensuring responsible development at
scale

  

What We Offer

✍️ **Contract Type:** We prefer B2B, but we’re flexible, what matters is long-
term commitment and impact  
📍 **Work From Anywhere:** Fully remote. Choose the environment where you do
your best work  
🏝️ **Paid Time Off:** 4 weeks (20 working days) of PTO per year to recharge
and reset  
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 **Annual Gathering:** A yearly in-person meetup to connect,
brainstorm, and celebrate wins together  
❤️‍🩹 **Health & Wellness Support:** Up to $200 per year for wellbeing expenses
+ unlimited 1:1 sessions with psychologists and lifestyle experts through
_OpenUp_ (also available for up to three family members)  
🏢 **Co-Working Space Budget:** Work from a co-working space up to twice per
month (35 EUR / 40 USD per visit) to stay inspired and connected  
📚 **Learning Budget:** Dedicated funds to support your professional growth:
courses, books, conferences, events, or certifications  
💻 **Equipment:** Company laptop provided + monitor budget up to $250 for your
workspace setup  
⚡ **AI Tools Access:** Premium access to **ChatGPT,** **Cursor,** **Hugging
Face, and others,** to power your ideas and workflows

  

🎯 Top Tier Talent Is Our Multiplier

We’re a fully remote group of **A-players from Tier 1 tech** , led by an exec
team who’ve **launched, scaled, and exited multiple companies**. We move fast,
and care deeply about what we build — and who we build it with.

We’re looking for **exceptional talent** ready to ship & distribute world-
first AI products at scale, fast, and co-create with us this category-defining
business.

**If that’s you — reach out and apply!**

**  
**

**💡 External Referral Program**

**Know someone who could be a great fit for this role?** You can refer them
through the **EverAI External Referral Program** and earn a bonus of **up to
$2,500** if they’re hired. [Submit a referral
here.](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeuvD8GKtVT8Q33nsdF691LTEAFRErTK4JPyFrZlLMaWF82GQ/viewform?usp=preview)
jobCategory: 市场营销,用户增长,数据分析,AI,运营

postTitle: Quantitative Research Team Lead (Completed) at Apexver
jobTitle: Quantitative Research Team Lead (Completed) at Apexver
descContent:
Role Overview

As the Quantitative Research Team Lead, you will head a team of quants and
researchers dedicated to developing trading strategies, improving alpha
models, and optimizing execution. This role is both hands-on research and
strategic leadership: you will drive model development, oversee research
pipelines, and mentor team members while shaping Apexver’s research roadmap.

You will partner with traders, engineers, and data scientists to push the
boundaries of what’s possible in high-frequency and systematic trading.

Key Responsibilities

• Leadership & Strategy

◦ Lead, mentor, and grow a team of quantitative researchers.

◦ Define research priorities, align with trading and technology strategy, and
ensure results deliver measurable alpha.

◦ Instill best practices for model development, testing, and deployment.

• Research & Innovation

◦ Develop and refine alpha models, statistical arbitrage signals, and
systematic trading strategies.

◦ Explore large-scale datasets to identify patterns, anomalies, and predictive
signals.

◦ Partner with engineers to translate research into robust, production-ready
systems.

• Collaboration & Execution

◦ Work closely with traders and risk managers to integrate models into
execution pipelines.

◦ Collaborate with infrastructure teams to optimize simulation environments,
backtesting frameworks, and data feeds.

◦ Balance short-term opportunities with long-term research initiatives.

Qualifications

Required:

• 7+ years of experience in quantitative research / systematic trading, with
at least 2+ years in a leadership capacity.

• Advanced degree (PhD strongly preferred, MSc acceptable) in Mathematics,
Physics, Computer Science, Statistics, or related quantitative discipline.

• Deep experience with time-series analysis, probability, statistics, and
machine learning methods.

• Strong programming skills in Python (for research) and familiarity with C++
(for production alignment).

• Proven track record of delivering profitable trading strategies or alpha
models.

• Strong leadership, communication, and ability to align a multi-disciplinary
team.

Nice to Have:

• Background in high-frequency trading (HFT) or market-making.

• Expertise in market microstructure, execution algorithms, or exchange
connectivity.

• Experience managing petabyte-scale datasets and distributed research
pipelines.

• Comfort with risk management frameworks and capital allocation.

Why Join Apexver?

• Compensation & upside: €180k base salary + up to 100% performance bonus.

• Impact: Shape the research direction of a fast-growing proprietary trading
firm.

• Collaboration: Work alongside elite engineers and traders on high-stakes
challenges.

• Innovation: Freedom to test ideas quickly, deploy models, and iterate in
production.

• Culture: Flat, collaborative, and meritocratic environment where best ideas
win.

Application

If you are excited to lead a world-class research team, love solving problems
where milliseconds and insights matter, and want to directly impact the future
of Apexver’s trading business — we’d love to talk to you.
jobCategory: 算法,AI,数据分析,金融,项目管理

postTitle: Software Engineer C++ (Senior) at Apexver
descContent:
**Role Overview**

As a **Senior Software Engineer** , you will take leadership in designing,
building, and scaling high-performance trading systems. You will be driving
architectural decisions, mentoring others, and ensuring the reliability,
latency, and correctness of our production systems.  
Your role will bridge between quant research, trading operations, and
engineering excellence.

**Key Responsibilities**

  * Lead design, development, and ownership of large, complex C++ systems: engines for order execution, market data ingestion, risk, connectivity, and downstream services.

  * Architect systems for low latency, high throughput, fault tolerance, and operational resilience.

  * Identify performance bottlenecks across software/hardware layers; lead initiatives to reduce latency, increase capacity, and improve stability.

  * Mentor and lead other engineers through code reviews, pairing, and driving best practices in code structure, testing, and performance.

  * Liaise closely with quant researchers and traders: influence product and strategy design, ensuring designs satisfy functional, non-functional, and latency constraints.

  * Drive infrastructure and tooling improvements: monitoring, observability, deployment pipelines, build systems, profiling frameworks, and latency measurement tools.

  * Stay up to date with new technologies and architectures (e.g. kernel bypass, RDMA, NUMA, CPU/GPU/FPGAs) and evaluate them for potential adoption.

**Qualifications**

**Required**

  * 5+ years (often 7+) of experience building production C++ systems, ideally in latency-sensitive or real-time environments.

  * Deep expertise in modern C++ (C++17/20/23), templates, metaprogramming, memory management, and allocation strategies.

  * Strong understanding of concurrency: multi-threading, lock-free programming, synchronization, hardware caches, and memory fences.

  * Proven track record in optimizing performance (latency, throughput); experience profiling and benchmarking at a low level.

  * Experience with network programming: TCP/UDP, protocol design, or low-level kernel/OS tuning.

  * Familiarity with distributed systems, messaging, resilience under load, and graceful degradation.

  * Excellent system-level thinking: balancing trade-offs (latency vs. safety vs. maintainability).

  * Strong leadership and communication skills; ability to push standards, mentor juniors, and influence design across teams.

**Nice to Have**

  * Prior HFT / proprietary trading / market making experience.

  * Deep knowledge of financial market microstructure: order books, matching engines, FIX protocols, exchange connectivity.

  * Experience or interest in hardware acceleration (FPGA), kernel bypass, DPDK, RDMA, or similar.

  * Exposure to other languages/tools relevant to quant or trading environments: Python, scripting, data processing, GPUs.

  * Advanced education (MS/PhD in CS, EE, Physics, Mathematics, etc.) is a plus but not required.

**What You’ll Gain**

  * A leadership role where your decisions shape both technical architecture and trading outcomes.

  * Opportunities to tackle cutting-edge engineering challenges where performance, scale, and correctness are non-negotiable.

  * Ability to mentor and grow a team; influence culture, standards, and technical excellence.

  * Excellent compensation, bonuses, and profit-sharing aligned with results and contribution.

  * A culture of high trust, where engineers have autonomy and the chance to experiment — and where learning from mistakes is valued.

**General: What Makes a Great Fit at Apexver**

  * You enjoy solving hard problems where edge vs. margin matters.

  * You’re curious and love going “under the hood” — whether it’s the OS, hardware, or network layer.

  * You take ownership end-to-end: from problem-solving and coding to testing, deploying, and monitoring.

  * You thrive in flat, collaborative, fast-moving teams.

  * You value clean code, correctness, performance, and pragmatism.
salary: 优秀薪酬、奖金和利润分享
jobCategory: 后端开发,金融,DevOps/MLOps,算法,运维
